analyzed: siyā na lokuttaram tat ca ayuttam duvidhassa api icchitabba ttā

original: Tanti lokiyasaraṇagamanaṃ. Saddhāpaṭilābho “sammāsambuddho bhagavā”tiādinā. Saddhāmūlikāti
analyzed: lokiya saraṇa gamanam saddhā paṭilābhaḥ sammāsambuddhaḥ bhagavā ati ādinā saddhāmūlikā iti

original: yathāvuttasaddhāpubbaṅgamā. Sammādiṭṭhi buddhasubuddhataṃ, dhammasudhammataṃ, saṅghasuppaṭipattiñca

analyzed: saddhā upanissayā yathā vutta lakkhaṇā paññā lokiya saraṇa gamananti dasseti tena āha diṭṭhi ju kamman ti

original: vuccatī”ti. Diṭṭhiyeva attano paccayehi uju karīyatīti katvā, diṭṭhi vā uju karīyati
analyzed: vuccati iti diṭṭhiyā iva attanaḥ paccayehi uju karīyati iti katvā diṭṭhi vā uju karīyati

original: etenāti diṭṭhijukammaṃ, tathāpavatto cittuppādo. Evañca katvā “tapparāyaṇatākārappavatto
analyzed: etena ati diṭṭhi ju kammam tathā pavattaḥ citta uppādo evam ca katvā tad parāyaṇa tā ākāra ppavatto

original: cittuppādo”ti idañca vacanaṃ samatthitaṃ hoti, saddhāpubbaṅgamasammādiṭṭhiggahaṇaṃ
analyzed: citta uppādaḥ ti idam ca vacanam samatthitam hoti saddhā pubbaṅgama sammādiṭṭhi ggahaṇam

analyzed: pana cittuppādassa tad padhāna tāya ati daṭṭhabbam saddhā paṭilābhaḥ ti iminā mātā ādīhi

analyzed: ñāṇa sampayuttam saraṇa gamanam

analyzed: tayā idam lokiyam saraṇa gamanam attā sanniyyātīyati appīyati pariccajīyati etena ati

original: attasanniyyātanaṃ, yathāvuttaṃ diṭṭhijukammaṃ. Taṃ ratanattayaṃ parāyaṇaṃ paṭisaraṇaṃ

analyzed: etassa ati tad parāyaṇaḥ puggalo cittuppādo vā tassa bhāvo tad parāyaṇa tā yathā vuttam

original: diṭṭhijukammameva. Saraṇanti adhippāyena sissabhāvaṃ antevāsikabhāvaṃ upagacchati
analyzed: diṭṭhi ju kammam eva saraṇanti adhippāyena sissa bhāvam antevāsika bhāvam upagacchati

original: etenāti sissabhāvūpagamanaṃ. Saraṇagamanādhippāyeneva paṇipatati etenāti paṇipāto.
analyzed: etena ati sissa bhāva upagamanam saraṇa gamana adhippāyena iva paṇipatati etena ati paṇipātaḥ

original: Sabbattha yathāvuttadiṭṭhijukammavaseneva attho veditabbo. Attapariccajananti saṃsāradukkhanissaraṇatthaṃ

analyzed: atta sanniyyātana ādīsu pi tattha tattha vattabbam evam hi tad añña nivattanam katam hoti

original: Evaṃ attasanniyyātanādīni ekena pakārena dassetvā idāni aparehipi pakārehi dassetuṃ
analyzed: evam atta sanniyyātana ādīni ekena pakārena dassetvā idāni aparehi pi pakārehi dassetum

original: “apicā”tiādi āraddhaṃ. Tena pariyāyantarehipi attasanniyyātanaṃ katameva hoti atthassa
analyzed: apica ati ādi āraddham tena atta sanniyyātanam katamā iva hoti atthassa

original: abhinnattāti dasseti. Āḷavakādīnanti ādi-saddena sātāgirihemavatādīnaṃ saṅgaho daṭṭhabbo.
analyzed: dasse ti āḷavaka ādīnam ti ādi saddena sātāgiri hemavata ādīnam saṅgahaḥ daṭṭhabbo

original: Nanu cete āḷavakādayo maggeneva āgatasaraṇagamanā, kathaṃ tesaṃ tapparāyaṇatāsaraṇagamanaṃ

analyzed: vuttam ti maggena āgata saraṇa gamanehi pi saḥ aham vicarissāmi pe su dhammatam te mayam

original: vicarissāma, gāmā gāmaṃ nagā nagaṃ…pe… sudhammata”nti ca tehi tapparāyaṇatākārassa

original: paveditattā tathā vuttaṃ.
analyzed: pavedita ttā tathā vuttam

original: So panesa ñāti…pe… vasenāti ettha ñātivasena, bhayavasena, ācariyavasena, dakkhiṇeyyavasenāti

original: paccekaṃ “vasenā”ti padaṃ yojetabbaṃ. Tattha ñātivasenāti ñātibhāvavasena. Evaṃ sesesupi.
analyzed: paccekam vasena ati padam yojetabbam tattha ñāti vasena āti ñāti bhāva vasena evam sesesu pi

original: Dakkhiṇeyyapaṇipātenāti dakkhiṇeyyatāhetukena paṇipatanenāti attho. Itarehīti ñātibhāvādivasappavattehi

original: tīhi paṇipātehi. Itarehītiādinā saṅkhepato vuttamatthaṃ vitthārato dassetuṃ “tasmā”tiādi
analyzed: tīhi paṇipātehi itarehi itiādinā saṅkhepataḥ vuttam attham vitthārataḥ dassetum tasmā itiādi

analyzed: vuttam vandati iti paṇipātassa lakkhaṇa vacanam evarūpanti diṭṭhadhammikam sandhāya

analyzed: sabba dukkha kkhayo ti sakalassa vaṭṭa dukkhassa anuppāda nirodhaḥ etat ti cattāri ariya saccāni

original: Niccato anupagamanādivasenāti niccanti aggahaṇādivasena. Aṭṭhānanti hetuppaṭikkhepo.

original: Diṭṭhisampannoti maggadiṭṭhiyā samannāgato sotāpanno. Kañci saṅkhāranti catubhūmakesu

original: Attavāre kasiṇādipaññattisaṅgahatthaṃ “saṅkhāra”nti avatvā “kañci dhamma”nti vuttaṃ.

analyzed: imesu pi ṭhānesu catu bhūmaka vasena iva paricchedaḥ veditabbo te bhūmaka vasena iva vā yam

analyzed: imam attham pakāsentassa velāma suttassa vasena vuttam ha etam yam gahapati velāmaḥ

original: vicikicchā saṃsayo. Micchāñāṇaṃ tassa guṇānaṃ aguṇabhāvaparikappanena viparītaggāho.

original: Ādi-saddena anādarāgāravādīnaṃ saṅgaho. Na mahājutikanti na ujjalaṃ, aparisuddhaṃ

original: Avipākattā. Na hi taṃ akusalanti.
analyzed: a vipāka ttāḥ na hi tam akusalanti

analyzed: tena kena pavatti nimittena upāsaka saddaḥ tasmin puggale niruḷhaḥ iti dasseti tena āha

original: hotīti attho. Ko ājīvoti ko assa sammāājīvo? So pana micchājīvassa parivajjanena
analyzed: hoti iti attho kaḥ ājīvo ti kaḥ assa sammāājīvo so pana micchājīvassa parivajjanena

original: hotīti sopi vibhajīyatīti. Kā vipattīti kā sīlassa, ājīvassa vā vipatti. Anantarassa

original: gamakattā “asūriyapassā”tiādīsu viya. Tenāha “kataṃ na jānātī”ti. Akatavedīti etthāpi
analyzed: gamaka ttā a sūriya passa ati ādīsu viya tena āha katam na jānāti iti akata vedī iti ettha api

original: eseva nayo. Pākaṭaṃ katvā na jānātīti “idañcidañca mayhaṃ iminā kata”nti saṅghamajjhagaṇamajjhādīsu
analyzed: pākaṭam katvā na jānāti iti idam ca idam ca mayham iminā saṅgha majjha gaṇa majjha ādīsu

original: pākaṭaṃ katvā na jānāti, na pakāsetīti vuttaṃ hoti. Upaññātanti thomanāvasena upagantvā
analyzed: pākaṭam katvā na jānāti na pakāseti iti vuttam hoti upaññātam ti thomanā vasena upagantvā

original: ñātaṃ. Tenāha “vaṇṇita”ntiādi.
analyzed: ñātam tena āha vaṇṇita ntiādi

original: 34. Dutiye vassasataparimāṇamāyu assāti vassasatāyuko, vassasatāyukatañca vassasatāyukakāle
analyzed: dutiye vassa sata parimāṇam āyu assāti vassa sata āyukaḥ vassa sata āyukatam ca vassa sata āyuka kāle

original: jātasseva hoti, nāññassāti āha “vassasatāyukakāle jāto”ti. Vassasataṃ jīvati sīlenāti
analyzed: jātassa iva hoti na aññassa ati āha vassa sata āyuka kāle jātaḥ ti vassa satam jīvati sīlena ati

original: vassasatajīvī. Vassasatanti ca accantasaṃyoge upayogavacanaṃ. Tenāha “sakalaṃ vassasataṃ
analyzed: vassa sata jīvī ca ac canta saṃyoge upayoga vacanam tena āha sakalam vassa satam

original: jīvanto”ti. Mātāpitūnaṃ mātāva bahūpakāratarāti tassāyeva padhānabhāvena paṭikātabbattā
analyzed: jīvantaḥ ti mātā pitūnam mātā ava bahu upakāratarā ati tassā yā iva padhāna bhāvena paṭikātabba ttā

original: dakkhiṇaṃ aṃsakūṭaṃ vadanti. Hadayalohitaṃ pāyetvāti khīraṃ sandhāya vadati. Lohitañhi
analyzed: dakkhiṇam aṃsakūṭam vadanti hadaya lohitam pāyetvā ati khīram sandhāya vadati lohitam hi

original: khīrabhāvena pariṇāmaṃ gacchati. Tyāssāti te assa. Sesamettha uttānameva.
analyzed: khīra bhāvena pariṇāmam gacchati sesam ettha uttānam eva

original: 35. Tatiye tenupasaṅkamīti ettha yenādhippāyena so brāhmaṇo bhagavantaṃ upasaṅkami,
analyzed: tatiye tena upasaṅkami iti ettha yena adhippāyena saḥ brāhmaṇaḥ bhagavantam upasaṅkami

original: taṃ pākaṭaṃ katvā dassetuṃ “so hi brāhmaṇo”tiādimāha. Virajjhanapañhanti yaṃ pañhaṃ
analyzed: tam pākaṭam katvā dassetum saḥ hi brāhmaṇa uti ādim āha virajjhana pañham ti yam pañham

original: puṭṭho virajjhitvā kathesi, aviparītaṃ katvā sampādetuṃ na sakkoti, tādisaṃ pañhanti
analyzed: puṭṭhaḥ virajjhitvā kathesi a viparītam katvā sampādetum na sakkoti tādisam pañhanti

original: attho. Ubhatokoṭikaṃ pañhanti ubhohi koṭīhi yuttaṃ pañhaṃ. “Kiṃvādī bhavaṃ gotamo”ti
analyzed: ubhatokoṭikam pañhanti ubhohi koṭīhi yuttam pañham kiṃvādī bhavam gotamaḥ ti

original: hi puṭṭho “kiriyavādimhī”ti vā vadeyya “akiriyavādimhī”ti vā, tasmā imassa pañhassa
analyzed: hi puṭṭhaḥ kiriya vādimhi iti vā vadeyya akiriya vādimhi iti vā tasmai imassa pañhassa

original: vissajjane “kiriyavādimhī”ti ekā koṭi, “akiriyavādimhī”ti dutiyāti koṭidvayayutto
analyzed: vissajjane kiriya vādimhi iti ekā koṭi akiriya vādimhi iti dutiyā ati koṭi dvaya yutto

original: ayaṃ pañho. Uggilitunti dve koṭiyo mocetvā kathetuṃ asakkonto bahi nīharituṃ atthato
analyzed: ayam pañhaḥ uggilitunti dve koṭiyaḥ mocetvā kathetum a sakkontaḥ bahi nīharitum atthataḥ

original: apanetuṃ na sakkhissati. Dve koṭiyo mocento hi taṃ bahi nīharati nāma. Niggilitunti
analyzed: apanetum na sakkhissati dve koṭiyaḥ mocentaḥ hi tam bahi nīharati nāma niggilitunti

original: pucchāya dosaṃ datvā hāretuṃ asakkonto pavesetuṃ na sakkhissati. Tattha dosaṃ datvā
analyzed: pucchāya dosam da tvā hāretum a sakkontaḥ pavesetum na sakkhissati tattha dosam da tvā

original: hārento hi gilitvā viya adassanaṃ gamento paveseti nāma. Kiṃladdhikoti kiṃddiṭṭhiko.
analyzed: hārentaḥ hi gilitvā viya adassanam gamentaḥ paveseti nāma kiṃladdhiko ti kiṃddiṭṭhiko

original: Vadanti etenāti vādo, diṭṭhi. Ko vādo etassāti kiṃvādī. Kimakkhāyīti kimabhidhāyī,
analyzed: vadanti etena ati vādaḥ diṭṭhi kaḥ vādaḥ etassa ati kiṃvādī kimakkhāyī iti kimabhidhāyī

original: kīdisī dhammakathā. Tenāha “kiṃ nāma…pe… pucchatī”ti. Sesamettha uttānameva.
analyzed: kīdisī dhamma kathā tena āha kim nāma pe pucchati iti sesam ettha uttānam eva

original: 36. Catutthe dakkhiṇaṃ arahantīti dakkhiṇeyyā. Āhunaṃ vuccati dānaṃ, taṃ arahantīti āhuneyyā.
analyzed: catutthe dakkhiṇam arahanti iti dakkhiṇeyyā āhunam vuccati dānam tam arahanti iti āhuneyyā

original: 37. Pañcame kathamayaṃ migāramātā nāma jātāti āha “sā hī”tiādi. Sabbajeṭṭhakassa
analyzed: pañcame katham ayam migāramātā nāma jātā iti āha sā hi itiādi sabbajeṭṭhakassa

original: puttassāti attano puttesu sabbapaṭhamaṃ jātassa puttassa. Ayyakaseṭṭhinova samānanāmakattāti
analyzed: puttassa ati attano puttesu sabba paṭhamam jātassa puttassa ayyaka seṭṭhino uva samāna nāmaka ttā ati

original: migāraseṭṭhinā eva sadisanāmakattā. Tassā kira sabbajeṭṭhassa puttassa nāmaggahaṇadivase
analyzed: migāraseṭṭhinā eva sadisa nāmaka ttā tassā kira sabbajeṭṭhassa puttassa nāma ggahaṇa divase

original: ayyakassa migāraseṭṭhisseva nāmaṃ akaṃsu. Anibaddhavāso hutvāti ekasmiṃyeva vihāre
analyzed: ayyakassa migāra seṭṭhissa iva nāmam akaṃsu a nibaddha vāsaḥ hutvā ati ekasmiṃ yeva vihāre

original: nibaddhavāso ahutvā. Dhuvaparibhogānīti niyataparibhogāni. Nanu bhagavā kadāci cārikampi
analyzed: nibaddha vāsaḥ a hutvā dhuva paribhogāni iti niyata paribhogāni nanu bhagavā kadācid

original: pakkamati, kathaṃ tāni senāsanāni dhuvaparibhogena paribhuñjīti āha “utuvassaṃ cārikaṃ
analyzed: pakkamati katham tāni senāsanāni dhuva paribhogena paribhuñji iti āha utuvassam cārikam

original: caritvāpī”tiādi. Tattha utuvassanti hemantagimhe sandhāya vadati. Maggaṃ ṭhapetvāti
analyzed: caritvā api itiādi tattha utu vassanti hemanta gimhe sandhāya vadati maggam ṭhapetvā ati

original: therassa āgamanamaggaṃ ṭhapetvā. Uṇhavalāhakāti uṇhautuno paccayabhūtameghamālāsamuṭṭhāpakā
analyzed: therassa āgamana maggam ṭhapetvā uṇha valāhakā ati paccaya bhūta megha mālā samuṭṭhāpakā

original: devaputtā. Tesaṃ kira tathācittuppādasamakālameva yathicchitaṃ ṭhānaṃ uṇhaṃ pharamānā,
analyzed: deva puttā tesam kira tathā cittuppāda sama kālam eva yathā icchitam ṭhānam uṇham pharamānā

original: valāhakamālā nātibahalā ito cito nabhaṃ chādentī vidhāvati. Esa nayo sītavalāhakavassavalāhakāsu.
analyzed: valāhaka mālā na ati bahalā itas citas nabham chādentī vidhāvati esa nayo sīta valāhaka vassa valāhakāsu

original: Abbhavalāhakā pana devatā sītuṇhavassehi vinā kevalaṃ abbhapaṭalasseva samuṭṭhāpakā
analyzed: abbha valāhakā pana devatā sītuṇha vassehi vinā kevalam abbha paṭalassa iva samuṭṭhāpakā

original: veditabbā. Kevalaṃ vā vātasseva, teneva devatā vātavalāhakā.
analyzed: veditabbā kevalam vā vātassa iva tena iva devatā vāta valāhakā

original: Ettha ca yaṃ vassāne ca sisire ca abbhaṃ uppajjati, taṃ utusamuṭṭhānaṃ pākatikameva.
analyzed: ettha ca yam vassāne ca sisire ca abbham uppajjati tam utu samuṭṭhānam pākatikam eva

original: Yaṃ pana abbhamhiyeva atiabbhaṃ sattāhampi candasūriye chādetvā ekandhakāraṃ karoti,
analyzed: yam pana ati abbham satta aham pi canda sūriye chādetvā eka andhakāram karoti

original: yañca cittavesākhamāsesu abbhaṃ, taṃ devatānubhāvena uppannaṃ abbhanti veditabbaṃ.
analyzed: yat ca citta vesākha māsesu abbham tam devatā anubhāvena uppannam abbham ti veditabbam

original: Yo ca tasmiṃ tasmiṃ utumhi uttaradakkhiṇādipakativāto hoti, ayaṃ utusamuṭṭhāno. Vātepi
analyzed: yaḥ ca tasmim tasmim utumhi uttara dakkhiṇa ādi pakati vātaḥ hoti ayam utu samuṭṭhānaḥ vāte pi

original: vanarukkhakkhandhādippadālano ativāto nāma atthi. Ayañceva, yo ca aññopi akālavāto,
analyzed: vana rukkha kkhandha ādi ppadālanaḥ ativātaḥ nāma atthi ayam ca iva yaḥ ca añño api akālavāto

original: ayañca devatānubhāvena nibbatto. Yaṃ gimhāne uṇhaṃ, taṃ utusamuṭṭhānikaṃ pākatimeva.
analyzed: ayam ca devatā anubhāvena nibbattaḥ yam gimhāne uṇham tam utu samuṭṭhānikam pākatim eva

original: Yaṃ pana uṇhepi atiuṇhaṃ sītakāle ca uppannaṃ uṇhaṃ, taṃ devatānubhāvena nibbattaṃ.
analyzed: yam pana uṇhe api ati uṇham sīta kāle ca uppannam uṇham tam devatā anubhāvena nibbattam

original: Yaṃ vassāne ca hemante ca sītaṃ hoti, taṃ utusamuṭṭhānameva. Yaṃ pana sītepi atisītaṃ,
analyzed: yam vassāne ca hemante ca sītam hoti tam utu samuṭṭhānam eva yam pana sītā api ati sītam

original: gimhe ca uppannaṃ sītaṃ, taṃ devatānubhāvena nibbattaṃ. Yaṃ vassike cattāro māse
analyzed: gimhe ca uppannam sītam tam devatā anubhāvena nibbattam yam vassike cattāraḥ māse

original: vassaṃ, taṃ utusamuṭṭhānameva, yaṃ pana vasseyeva ativassaṃ, yañca cittavesākhamāsesu
analyzed: vassam tam utu samuṭṭhānam eva yam pana ativassam yam ca citta vesākha māsesu

original: vassaṃ, taṃ devatānubhāvena nibbattaṃ.
analyzed: vassam tam devatā anubhāvena nibbattam

original: Tatridaṃ vatthu – eko kira vassavalāhakadevaputto tagarakūṭavāsikhīṇāsavattherassa
analyzed: tatra idam vatthu ekaḥ kira vassavalāhaka deva putto tagarakūṭa vāsi khīṇāsava therassa

original: santikaṃ gantvā vanditvā aṭṭhāsi. Thero – “kosi tva”nti pucchi. Ahaṃ, bhante, vassavalāhako
analyzed: santikam gantvā vanditvā aṭṭhāsi thero ko asi tvanti pucchi aham bhante vassa valāhako

original: devaputtoti. Tumhākaṃ kira cittena devo vassatīti? Āma, bhanteti. Passitukāmā mayanti.
analyzed: deva putto ti tumhākam kira cittena devaḥ vassati iti āma bhante iti passitu kāmāḥ mayanti

original: Temissatha, bhanteti. Meghasīsaṃ vā gajjitaṃ vā na paññāyati, kathaṃ temissāmāti?
analyzed: temissatha bhante iti megha sīsam vā gajjitam vā na paññāyati katham temissāma ati

original: Bhante, amhākaṃ cittena devo vassati, tumhe paṇṇasālaṃ pavisathāti. Sādhu devaputtāti
analyzed: bhante amhākam cittena devaḥ vassati tumhe paṇṇa sālam pavisatha ati sādhu devaputta ati

original: pāde dhovitvā paṇṇasālaṃ pāvisi. Devaputto tasmiṃ pavisanteyeva ekaṃ gītaṃ gāyitvā
analyzed: pāde dhovitvā paṇṇa sālam pāvisi devaputto tasmin ekam gītam gāyitvā

original: hatthaṃ ukkhipi, samantā tiyojanaṭṭhānaṃ ekameghaṃ ahosi. Thero aḍḍhatinto paṇṇasālaṃ paviṭṭhoti.
analyzed: hattham ukkhipi samantā ti yojana ṭṭhānam eka megham ahosi theraḥ aḍḍhatintaḥ paṇṇa sālam paviṭṭhaḥ ti

original: Kāmaṃ heṭṭhā vuttāpi devatā cātumahārājikāva, tā pana tena tena visesena vatvā idāni
analyzed: kāmam heṭṭhā vuttā api devatā cātumahārājikā va tā pana tena tena visesena vatvā idāni

original: tadaññe paṭhamabhūmike kāmāvacaradeve sāmaññato gaṇhanto “cātumahārājikā”ti āha.
analyzed: tad aññe paṭhama bhūmike kāmāvacara deve sāmaññataḥ gaṇhantaḥ cātumahārājikā iti āha

original: Dhataraṭṭhavirūḷhakavirūpakkhakuverasaṅkhātā cattāro mahārājāno etesanti cātumahārājikā,
analyzed: cattāraḥ mahārājānaḥ etesanti cātumahārājikā

original: te sinerussa pabbatassa vemajjhe honti. Tesu pabbataṭṭhakāpi atthi ākāsaṭṭhakāpi.
analyzed: te sinerussa pabbatassa vemajjhe honti tesu pabbata ṭṭhakā api atthi ākāsa ṭṭhakā api

original: Tesaṃ paramparā cakkavāḷapabbataṃ pattā. Khiḍḍāpadosikā manopadosikā candimā devaputto
analyzed: tesam paramparā cakkavāḷa pabbatam pattā khiḍḍāpadosikā manopadosikā candimā devaputto

original: sūriyo devaputtoti ete sabbepi cātumahārājikadevalokaṭṭhā eva.
analyzed: sūriyaḥ deva putto ti ete sabbe pi cātumahārājika deva loka ṭṭhāḥ eva

original: Tāvatiṃsāti tāvatiṃsānaṃ devānaṃ nāmaṃ, tepi atthi pabbataṭṭhakā, atthi ākāsaṭṭhakā,
analyzed: tāvatiṃsā ti tāvatiṃsānam devānam nāmam te pi atthi pabbata ṭṭhakā atthi ākāsa ṭṭhakā

original: tesaṃ paramparā cakkavāḷapabbataṃ pattā. Tathā yāmādīnaṃ. Ekadevalokepi hi devānaṃ
analyzed: tesam paramparā cakkavāḷa pabbatam pattā tathā yāma ādīnam eka deva loke pi hi devānam

original: paramparā cakkavāḷapabbataṃ appattā nāma natthi. Tattha maghena māṇavena saddhiṃ
analyzed: paramparā cakkavāḷa pabbatam appattā nāma natthi tattha maghena māṇavena saddhiṃ

original: macalagāme kālaṃ katvā tettiṃsa sahapuññakārino ettha nibbattāti taṃ sahacāritaṃ
analyzed: macalagāme kālam katvā tettiṃsa saha puñña kārino ettha nibbattā ati tam sahacāritam

original: ṭhānaṃ tettiṃsaṃ, tadeva tāvatiṃsaṃ, taṃ nivāso etesanti tāvatiṃsāti vadanti. Yasmā
analyzed: ṭhānam tettiṃsam tat eva tāvatiṃsam tam nivāsaḥ vadanti yasmā

original: pana sesacakkavāḷesupi chakāmāvacaradevalokā atthi. Vuttampi cetaṃ “sahassaṃ cātumahārājikānaṃ
analyzed: pana sesa cakkavāḷesu pi cha kāmāvacara deva lokāḥ atthi vuttam pi ca itam sahassam cātumahārājikānam

original: sahassaṃ tāvatiṃsāna”nti. Tasmā nāmapaṇṇattiyevesā tassa devalokassāti veditabbā.
analyzed: sahassam tāvatiṃsānam ti tasmā nāma paṇṇattiyā iva esā tassa deva lokassa ati veditabbā

original: Dukkhato yātā apayātāti yāmā. Attano sirisampattiyā tusaṃ itā gatāti tusitā. Nimmāne
analyzed: dukkhataḥ yātā apayātā ati yāmāḥ attano siri sampattiyā tusam itā gatā ati tusitā nimmāne

original: rati etesanti nimmānaratino. Vasavattī devatāti paranimmitavasavattino devā. Paranimmitesu
analyzed: rati nimmāna ratinaḥ vasavattī devatā ati para nimmita vasavattinaḥ devā para nimmitesu

original: bhogesu vasaṃ vattentīti paranimmitavasavattino.
analyzed: bhogesu vasam vattenti iti para nimmita vasa vattinaḥ

original: Brūhito parivuddho tehi tehi jhānādīhi visiṭṭhehi guṇehīti brahmā. Vaṇṇavantatāya
analyzed: parivuddhaḥ tehi tehi jhāna ādīhi visiṭṭhehi guṇehi iti brahmā vaṇṇavanta tāya

original: ceva dīghāyukatāya ca brahmapārisajjādīhi mahanto brahmāti mahābrahmā. Tassa parisāyaṃ
analyzed: ca iva dīgha āyuka tāya ca brahma pārisajja ādīhi mahantaḥ brahmā ati mahābrahmā tassa parisāyam

original: bhavā paricārikāti brahmapārisajjā. Tasseva purohitaṭṭhāne ṭhitāti brahmapurohitā.
analyzed: bhavā paricārikā ati brahma pārisajjā tassa iva purohita ṭṭhāne ṭhitā ati brahma purohitā

original: Ābhassarehi parittā ābhā etesanti parittābhā. Appamāṇā ābhā etesanti appamāṇābhā.
analyzed: ābhassarehi parittāḥ ābhāḥ etesanti paritta ābhāḥ appamāṇāḥ ābhāḥ etesanti appamāṇa ābhā

original: Dīpikāya acci viya etesaṃ sarīrato ābhā chijjitvā chijjitvā patantī viya sarati vissaratīti
analyzed: dīpikāya etesam sarīrataḥ ābhā chijjitvā chijjitvā patantī viya sarati vissarati iti

original: ābhassarā, yathāvuttappabhāya ābhāsanasīlā vā ābhassarā. Subhāti sobhanā pabhā. Subhāti
analyzed: ābhassarā yathāvutta ppabhāya ābhāsana sīlā vā ābhassarā subhāti sobhanā pabhā subhāti

original: hi ekagghanā niccalā sarīrābhā vuccati, sā parittā subhā etesanti parittasubhā. Appamāṇā
analyzed: hi ekagghanā niccalā sarīra ābhā vuccati sā parittā subhā etesanti paritta subhā appamāṇā

original: subhā etesanti appamāṇasubhā. Subhena okiṇṇā vikiṇṇā, subhena sarīrappabhāvaṇṇena
analyzed: subhāḥ etesanti appamāṇa subhā subhena okiṇṇā vikiṇṇā subhena sarīra ppabhā vaṇṇena

original: ekagghanā suvaṇṇamañjūsāya ṭhapitasampajjalitakañcanapiṇḍasassirikāti subhakiṇṇā.
analyzed: ekagghanā suvaṇṇa mañjūsāya ṭhapita sampajjalita kañcana piṇḍa sassirikā ati subha kiṇṇā

original: Tattha sobhanāya pabhāya kiṇṇā subhākiṇṇāti vattabbe bhā-saddassa rassattaṃ antima
analyzed: tattha sobhanāya pabhāya kiṇṇā subhākiṇṇā iti vattabbe bhā saddassa rassa ttam antima

original: ṇa-kārassa ha-kārañca katvā “subhakiṇhā”ti vuttaṃ. Vipulaphalā vehapphalā. Vipulaphalāti
analyzed: ṇakārassa hakāram ca katvā subhakiṇhā iti vuttam vipulaphalā vehapphalā vipulaphalā ti

original: ca vipulasantasukhavaṇṇādiphalā. Appakena kālena attano ṭhānaṃ na vijahantīti avihā.
analyzed: ca vipula santa sukha vaṇṇa ādi phalāḥ appakena kālena attanaḥ ṭhānam na vijahanti iti avihā

original: Kenaci na tapanīyāti atappā. Akicchena sukhena passitabbā manuññarūpatāyāti sudassā.
analyzed: kenaci na tapanīyā ati atappā akicchena sukhena passitabbā manuñña rūpa tāya ati su dassā

original: Suparisuddhadassanatāya sammā passanti sīlenāti sudassī. Ukkaṭṭhasampattīhi yogato
analyzed: su parisuddha dassana tāya sammā passanti sīlena ati sudassī ukkaṭṭha sampattīhi yogataḥ

original: natthi etesaṃ kaniṭṭhā sampattīti akaniṭṭhā.
analyzed: natthi etesam kaniṭṭhā sampatti iti akaniṭṭhā

original: Kāyasakkhīhīti nāmakāyena desanāya sampaṭicchanavasena sakkhibhūtehi. Halāhalanti kolāhalaṃ. Mahaggatacittenāti catutthajjhānapādakena abhiññācittena.
analyzed: kāya sakkhīhi iti nāmakāyena desanāya sampaṭicchana vasena sakkhi bhūtehi halāhalanti kolāhalam mahaggata cittena ati catuttha jhāna pādakena abhiññā cittena

original: Nanu ca “ajjhattanti kāmabhavo, bahiddhāti rūpārūpabhavo”ti ca ayuttametaṃ? Yasmiñhi
analyzed: nanu ca kāma bhavaḥ ca yasmin hi

original: bhave sattā bahutaraṃ kālaṃ vasanti, so nesaṃ ajjhattaṃ. Yasmiñca appataraṃ kālaṃ
analyzed: bhave sattāḥ bahutaram kālam vasanti saḥ na īsam ajjhattam yasmin ca appataram kālam

original: vasanti, so nesaṃ bahiddhāti vattuṃ yuttaṃ. Rūpārūpabhave ca sattā cirataraṃ vasanti,
analyzed: vasanti saḥ bahiddhā ati vattum yuttam rūpa arūpa bhave ca sattā cirataram vasanti

original: appataraṃ kāmabhave, tasmā “ajjhattanti kāmabhavo, bahiddhāti rūpārūpabhavo”ti kasmā
analyzed: appataram kāma bhave tasmai kāma bhavaḥ bahiddhā ati rūpa a rūpa bhavaḥ uti kasmai

original: vuttanti āha “kiñcāpī”tiādi. Catutthameva koṭṭhāsanti vivaṭṭaṭṭhāyisaṅkhātaṃ catutthaṃ
analyzed: vuttan ti āha kiñcā api itiādi catuttham eva vivaṭṭa ṭṭhāyi saṅkhātam catuttham

original: asaṅkhyeyyakappaṃ. Itaresūti saṃvaṭṭasaṃvaṭṭaṭṭhāyivivaṭṭasaṅkhātesu tīsu asaṅkhyeyyakappesu.
analyzed: asaṅkhyeyya kappam itaresu iti saṃvaṭṭa saṃvaṭṭa ṭṭhāyi vivaṭṭa saṅkhātesu tīsu asaṅkhyeyya kappesu

original: Ālayoti saṅgo. Patthanāti “kathaṃ nāma tatrūpapannā bhavissāmā”ti abhipatthanā. Abhilāsoti
analyzed: ālayo ti saṅgo patthanā ati katham nāma tatru upapannāḥ bhavissāma ati abhipatthanā abhilāso ti

original: tatrūpapajjitukāmatā. Tasmātiādinā yathāvuttamatthaṃ nigameti.
analyzed: tatra upapajjitu kāma tā tasmāt iti ādinā yathāvuttam attham

original: Etthāyaṃ adhippāyo – kassacipi kilesassa avikkhambhitattā kenacipi pakārena vikkhambhanamattenapi
analyzed: ettha ayam adhippāyaḥ kassacipi kilesassa a vikkhambhita ttā kenacipi pakārena vikkhambhana mattena api

original: avimutto kāmabhavo ajjhattaggahaṇassa attānaṃ adhikicca uddissa pavattaggāhassa visesapaccayoti
analyzed: avimuttaḥ kāma bhavaḥ ajjhatta ggahaṇassa attānam adhikicca uddissa pavatta ggāhassa visesa paccayo ti

original: ajjhattaṃ nāma. Tattha bandhanaṃ ajjhattasaṃyojanaṃ, tena saṃyutto ajjhattasaṃyojano.
analyzed: ajjhattam nāma tattha bandhanam ajjhatta saṃyojanam tena saṃyuttaḥ ajjhatta saṃyojanaḥ

original: Tabbipariyāyato bahiddhāsaṃyojanoti.
analyzed: tad vipariyāyataḥ

original: Chandarāgavaseneva ajjhattasaṃyojanaṃ bahiddhāsaṃyojanañca puggalaṃ dassetvā idāni
analyzed: chanda rāga vasena iva ajjhatta saṃyojanam bahiddhā saṃyojanam ca puggalam dassetvā idāni

original: orambhāgiyauddhambhāgiyasaṃyojanavasenapi dassetuṃ “orambhāgiyāni vā”tiādimāha. Oraṃ
analyzed: orambhāgiya auddhambhāgiya saṃyojana vasena api dassetum orambhāgiyāni vā ati ādim āha oraṃ

original: vuccati kāmadhātu, paṭisandhiyā paccayabhāvena taṃ oraṃ bhajantīti orambhāgiyāni.
analyzed: vuccati kāmadhātu paṭisandhiyā paccaya bhāvena tam oram bhajanti iti orambhāgiyāni

original: Tattha ca kammunā vipākaṃ sattena ca dukkhaṃ saṃyojentīti saṃyojanāni, sakkāyadiṭṭhivicikicchāsīlabbataparāmāsakāmarāgapaṭighā.
analyzed: tattha ca kammunā vipākam sattena ca dukkham saṃyojenti iti saṃyojanāni sakkāya diṭṭhi vicikicchā sīlabbata parāmāsa kāma rāga paṭighā

original: Uddhaṃ vuccati rūpārūpadhātu, vuttanayenetaṃ uddhaṃ bhajantīti uddhambhāgiyāni, saṃyojanāni.
analyzed: uddham vuccati rūpa arūpa dhātu vutta nayena itam uddham bhajanti iti uddhambhāgiyāni saṃyojanāni

original: Rūparāgārūparāgamānuddhaccāvijjā. Atha vā orambhāgo vuccati kāmadhātu rūpārūpabhavato
analyzed: rūpa rāga arūpa rāgama anuddhacca avijjāḥ atha vā orambhāgaḥ vuccati kāmadhātu rūpa arūpa bhavato

original: heṭṭhābhūtattā, tatrūpapattiyā paccayabhāvato orambhāgassa hitānīti orambhāgiyāni
analyzed: heṭṭhā bhūta ttā paccaya bhāvato orambhāgassa hitāni iti orambhāgiyāni

original: yathā “vacchāyogo duhako”ti. Uddhambhāgo nāma mahaggatabhāvo, tassa hitāni uddhambhāgiyāni.
analyzed: yathā vacchā yogaḥ duhako ti uddhambhāgaḥ nāma mahaggata bhāvo tassa hitāni uddhambhāgiyāni

original: Pādesu baddhapāsāṇo viya pañcorambhāgiyasaṃyojanāni heṭṭhā ākaḍḍhamānākārāni honti.
analyzed: pādesu baddha pāsāṇaḥ viya pañca urambhāgiya saṃyojanāni heṭṭhā ākaḍḍhamāna ākārāni honti

original: Hatthehi gahitarukkhasākhā viya pañcuddhambhāgiyasaṃyojanāni upari ākaḍḍhamānākārāni.
analyzed: hatthehi gahita rukkha sākhāḥ viya pañcuddhambhāgiya saṃyojanāni upari ākaḍḍhamāna ākārāni

original: Yesañhi sakkāyadiṭṭhiādīni appahīnāni, te bhavaggepi nibbatte etāni ākaḍḍhitvā kāmabhaveyeva
analyzed: yesam hi sakkāya diṭṭhi ādīni appahīnāni te bhava agge pi nibbatte etāni ākaḍḍhitvā

original: pātenti, tasmā etāni pañca gacchantaṃ vārenti, gataṃ puna ānenti. Rūparāgādīni pañca
analyzed: tasmai etāni pañca gacchantam gatam punar ānenti rūpa rāga ādīni pañca

original: gacchantaṃ na vārenti, āgantuṃ pana na denti.
analyzed: gacchantam na āgantum pana na denti

original: Asamucchinnesu orambhāgiyasaṃyojanesu laddhapaccayesu uddhambhāgiyāni saṃyojanāni
analyzed: asamucchinnesu orambhāgiya saṃyojanesu laddha paccayesu uddhambhāgiyāni saṃyojanāni

original: agaṇanūpagāni hontīti labbhamānānampi puthujjanānaṃ vasena avibhajitvā ariyānaṃ yogavasena
analyzed: a gaṇana upagāni honti iti labbhamānānam api puthujjanānam vasena a vibhajitvā ariyānam yoga vasena

original: vibhajitukāmo “ubhayampi ceta”ntiādimāha. Tattha vaṭṭanissitamahājanassāti puthujjane
analyzed: vibhajitu kāmaḥ ubhayam pi cetan ti ādim āha tattha vaṭṭa nissita mahājanassa ati puthujjane

original: sandhāya vadati. Dvedhā paricchinnoti kāmasugatirūpārūpabhavavasena dvīhi pakārehi paricchinno.
analyzed: sandhāya vadati dvedhā kāma sugati rūpa arūpa bhava vasena dvīhi pakārehi

original: Vacchakasālopamaṃ uttānatthameva. Opammasaṃsandane pana kassaci kilesassa avikkhambhitattā,
analyzed: vacchaka sāla upamam uttānattham eva opamma saṃsandane pana kassaci kilesassa a vikkhambhita ttā

original: kathañcipi avimutto kāmabhavo ajjhattaggahaṇassa visesapaccayattā, imesaṃ sattānaṃ
analyzed: avimuttaḥ kāma bhavaḥ ajjhatta gahaṇassa visesa paccaya ttā imesam sattānam

original: abbhantaraṭṭhena anto nāma. Rūpārūpabhavo tabbipariyāyato bahi nāma. Tathā hi yassa
analyzed: abbhantara ṭṭhena antaḥ nāma rūpa arūpa bhavaḥ tad vipariyāyataḥ bahi nāma tathā hi yassa

original: orambhāgiyāni saṃyojanāni appahīnāni, so ajjhattasaṃyojano vutto. Yassa tāni pahīnāni,
analyzed: orambhāgiyāni saṃyojanāni appahīnāni saḥ ajjhatta saṃyojanaḥ vuttaḥ yassa tāni pahīnāni

original: so bahiddhāsaṃyojano. Tasmā anto asamucchinnabandhanatāya bahi ca pavattamānabhavaṅgasantānatāya
analyzed: saḥ bahiddhā saṃyojanaḥ tasmai antaḥ asamucchinna bandhana tāya bahi ca pavattamāna bhavaṅga santāna tāya

original: antobaddho bahisayito nāma. Nirantarappavattabhavaṅgasantānavasena hi sayitavohāro.
analyzed: antobaddhaḥ bahisayitaḥ nāma nirantara ppavatta bhavaṅga santāna vasena hi sayita vohāro

original: Kāmaṃ nesaṃ bahibandhanampi asamucchinnaṃ, antobandhanassa pana mūlatāya evaṃ vuttaṃ.
analyzed: kāmam bahibandhanam pi asamucchinnam antobandhanassa pana mūla tāya evam vuttam

original: Tenāha “saṃyojanaṃ pana tesaṃ kāmāvacarūpanibaddhamevā”ti. Iminā nayena sesattayepi attho veditabbo.
analyzed: tena āha saṃyojanam pana tesam kāmāvaca rūpa nibaddham evā ti iminā nayena sesa ttaye pi atthaḥ veditabbo

original: Ettāvatā ca kirāti kira-saddo arucisaṃsūcanattho. Tenettha ācariyavādassa attano
analyzed: ettāvatā ca kira ati kira saddo aruci saṃsūcana atthaḥ tena ittha ācariya vādassa attano

original: aruccanabhāvaṃ dīpeti. “Sīlavā”ti anāmaṭṭhavisesasāmaññato sīlasaṅkhepena gahitaṃ,
analyzed: dīpeti sīlavā ati an āmaṭṭha visesa sāmaññataḥ sīla saṅkhepena gahitam

original: tañca catubbidhanti ācariyatthero “catupārisuddhisīlaṃ uddisitvā”ti āha. Tatthāti
analyzed: tat ca catubbidhanti ācariya thero catu pārisuddhi sīlam uddisitvā ti āha tattha iti

original: catupārisuddhisīlesu. Jeṭṭhakasīlanti padhānasīlaṃ. Ubhayatthāti uddesaniddesesu,
analyzed: catu pārisuddhi sīlesu jeṭṭhaka sīlanti padhāna sīlam ubhayattha ati uddesa niddesesu

original: niddese viya uddesepi pātimokkhasaṃvarova therena vutto “sīlavā”ti vuttattāti adhippāyo.
analyzed: niddese viya uddese pi pātimokkha saṃvaraḥ uva therena vuttaḥ sīlavā ti vutta ttā ti adhippāyo

original: Sīlaggahaṇañhi pāḷiyaṃ pātimokkhasaṃvaravaseneva āgataṃ. Tenāha “pātimokkhasaṃvaroyevā”tiādi.
analyzed: sīla ggahaṇam hi pāḷiyam pātimokkha saṃvara vasena iva āgatam tena āha

original: Tattha avadhāraṇena itaresaṃ tiṇṇaṃ ekadesena pātimokkhantogadhabhāvaṃ dīpeti. Tathā
analyzed: tattha avadhāraṇena itaresam tiṇṇam ekadesena pātimokkha antogadha bhāvam dīpeti tathā

original: hi anolokiyolokane ājīvahetu ca sikkhāpadavītikkame gilānapaccayassa apaccavekkhitaparibhoge
analyzed: hi anolokiya ulokane ājīva hetu ca sikkhāpada vītikkame gilāna paccayassa a paccavekkhita paribhoge

original: ca āpatti vihitāti. Tīṇīti indriyasaṃvarasīlādīni. Sīlanti vuttaṭṭhānaṃ nāma atthīti
analyzed: ca āpatti vihitā ati tīṇi iti indriya saṃvara sīla ādīni sīlam ti vutta ṭṭhānam nāma atthi iti

original: sīlapariyāyena tesaṃ katthaci sutte gahitaṭṭhānaṃ nāma kiṃ atthi yathā “pātimokkhasaṃvaro”ti?
analyzed: sīla pariyāyena tesam katthaci sutte gahita ṭṭhānam nāma kim atthi yathā pātimokkha saṃvaro ti

original: Ācariyassa sammukhatāya appaṭikkhipanto upacārena pucchanto viya vadati. Tenāha “ananujānanto”ti.
analyzed: ācariyassa sammukha tāya a paṭikkhipantaḥ upacārena pucchantaḥ viya vadati tena āha ananujānantā iti

original: Chadvārarakkhāmattakamevāti tassa sallahukabhāvamāha cittādhiṭṭhānabhāvamattena paṭipākatikabhāvāpattito.
analyzed: cha dvāra rakkhā mattakam evā ti tassa sat lahuka bhāvam āha citta adhiṭṭhāna bhāva mattena paṭipākatika bhāva āpattitaḥ

original: Itaradvayepi eseva nayo. Paccayuppattimattakanti phalena hetuṃ dasseti. Uppādanahetukā
analyzed: itara dvaye pi esā iva nayaḥ paccaya uppatti mattakam ti phalena hetum dasseti uppādana hetukā

original: hi paccayānaṃ uppatti. Idamatthanti idaṃ payojanaṃ imassa paccayassa paribhuñjaneti
analyzed: hi paccayānam uppatti idamatthanti idam payojanam imassa paccayassa paribhuñjaneti

original: adhippāyo. Nippariyāyenāti iminā indriyasaṃvarādīni tīṇi padhānassa sīlassa paripālanavasena
analyzed: adhippāyaḥ nippariyāyena ati iminā indriya saṃvara ādīni tīṇi padhānassa sīlassa paripālana vasena

original: pavattiyā pariyāyasīlāni nāmāti dasseti. Idāni pātimokkhasaṃvarasseva padhānabhāvaṃ
analyzed: pavattiyā pariyāya sīlāni nāma ati dasseti idāni pātimokkha saṃvarassa iva padhāna bhāvam

original: byatirekato anvayato ca upamāya vibhāvetuṃ “yassā”tiādimāha. Tattha so pātimokkhasaṃvaro.
analyzed: byatirekataḥ anvayataḥ ca upamāya vibhāvetum yassa ati ādim āha tattha saḥ pātimokkha saṃvaro

original: Sesāni indriyasaṃvarādīni.
analyzed: sesāni indriya saṃvara ādīni

original: Pātimokkhasaṃvarasaṃvutoti yo hi naṃ pāti rakkhati, taṃ mokkheti moceti āpāyikādīhi
analyzed: pātimokkha saṃvara saṃvuto ti yaḥ hi nam pāti rakkhati tam mokkheti moca iti āpāyika ādīhi

original: dukkhehīti pātimokkhanti laddhanāmena sikkhāpadasīlena pihitakāyavacīdvāro. So pana
analyzed: dukkhehi iti laddha nāmena sikkhāpada sīlena pihita kāya vacī dvāro so pana

original: yasmā evaṃbhūto tena samannāgato nāma hoti, tasmā vuttaṃ “pātīmokkhasaṃvarena samannāgato”ti.
analyzed: yasmai evaṃbhūto tena samannāgato nāma hoti tasmā vuttam pātīmokkha saṃvarena samannāgato ti

original: Aparo nayo – kilesānaṃ balavabhāvato, pāpakiriyāya ca sukarabhāvato, puññakiriyāya
analyzed: aparaḥ nayaḥ kilesānam balava bhāvataḥ pāpa kiriyāya ca sukara bhāvataḥ puñña kiriyāya

original: ca dukkarabhāvato bahukkhattuṃ apāyesu patanasīloti pātī, puthujjano. Aniccatāya
analyzed: ca dukkara bhāvataḥ bahu kkhattum apāyesu patana sīlaḥ iti pātī puthujjanaḥ anicca tāya

original: vā bhavādīsu kammavegakkhitto ghaṭiyantaṃ viya anavaṭṭhānena paribbhamanato gamanato
analyzed: vā bhava ādīsu kamma vega kkhittaḥ ghaṭiyantam viya anavaṭṭhānena paribbhamanataḥ gamanataḥ

original: gamanasīloti pātī, maraṇavasena tamhi tamhi sattanikāye attabhāvassa pātanasīlo vā
analyzed: gamana sīlaḥ ti pātī maraṇa vasena tamhi tamhi satta nikāye atta bhāvassa pātana sīlaḥ vā

original: pātī, sattasantāno, cittameva vā. Taṃ pātiṃ saṃsāradukkhato mokkhetīti pātimokkhaṃ.
analyzed: pātī satta santāno cittam eva vā tam pātim saṃsāra dukkhataḥ mokkheti iti pātimokkham

original: Cittassa hi vimokkhena satto vimuttoti vuccati. Vuttañhi “cittavodānā visujjhantī”ti,
analyzed: cittassa hi vimokkhena sattaḥ vimuttaḥ ti vuccati vuttam hi citta vodānāḥ visujjhanti iti

original: “anupādāya āsavehi cittaṃ vimutta”nti ca.
analyzed: an upādāya āsavehi cittam vimuttanti ca

original: Atha vā avijjādinā hetunā saṃsāre patati gacchati pavattatīti pāti, “avijjānīvaraṇānaṃ
analyzed: atha vā avijjā ādinā hetunā saṃsāre patati gacchati pavattati iti pāti

original: sattānaṃ taṇhāsaṃyojanānaṃ sandhāvataṃ saṃsarata”nti hi vuttaṃ, tassa pātino sattassa
analyzed: sattānam taṇhā saṃyojanānam sandhāvatam saṃsaratanti hi vuttam tassa pātinaḥ sattassa

original: taṇhādisaṃkilesattayato mokkho etenāti pātimokkho. “Kaṇṭhekāḷo”tiādīnaṃ viyassa samāsasiddhi veditabbā.
analyzed: taṇhā ādi saṃkilesa ttayataḥ mokkhaḥ etena ati pātimokkhaḥ kaṇṭhekāḷa uti ādīnam viyassa samāsa siddhi veditabbā

original: Atha vā pāteti vinipāteti dukkheti pāti, cittaṃ. Vuttañhi –
analyzed: atha vā pāteti vinipāteti dukkheti pāti cittam vuttam hi

original: “Cittena nīyate loko, cittena parikassatī”ti; ;
analyzed: cittena nīyate lokaḥ cittena parikassati iti

original: Tassa pātino mokkho etenāti pātimokkho. Patati vā etena apāyadukkhe saṃsāradukkhe cāti pāti, taṇhādisaṃkileso. Vuttañhi –
analyzed: tassa pātinaḥ mokkho etena ati pātimokkho patati vā etena apāya dukkhe saṃsāra dukkhe ca ati pāti taṇhā ādi saṃkileso vuttam hi

original: “Taṇhā janehi purisaṃ, taṇhādutiyo puriso”ti ca ādi;
analyzed: taṇhā janehi purisam taṇhā dutiyaḥ purisaḥ iti ca ādi

original: Tato pātito mokkhoti pātimokkho.
analyzed: tatas pātitaḥ mokkho ti pātimokkho

original: Atha vā patati etthāti pāti, cha ajjhattikabāhirāni āyatanāni. Vuttañhi –
analyzed: atha vā patati ettha ati pāti cha ajjhattika bāhirāni āyatanāni vuttam hi

original: “Chasu loko samuppanno, chasu kubbati santhava”nti ;
analyzed: chasu loko samuppannaḥ chasu kubbati santhavanti

original: Tato chaajjhattikabāhirāyatanasaṅkhātato pātito mokkhoti pātimokkho.
analyzed: tatas cha ajjhattika bāhira āyatana saṅkhātataḥ pātitaḥ mokkho ti pātimokkho

original: Atha vā pāto vinipāto assa atthīti pātī, saṃsāro. Tato mokkhoti pātimokkho.
analyzed: atha vā pātaḥ vinipātaḥ assa atthi iti pātī saṃsāro tatas mokkho ti pātimokkho

original: Atha vā sabbalokādhipatibhāvato dhammissaro bhagavā “patī”ti vuccati, muccati etenāti
analyzed: atha vā sabba loka adhipati bhāvataḥ dhammissaraḥ bhagavā pati iti vuccati muccati etena ati

original: mokkho, patino mokkho patimokkho tena paññattattāti, patimokkho eva pātimokkho. Sabbaguṇānaṃ
analyzed: mokkhaḥ patinaḥ mokkhaḥ patimokkho tena paññatta ttā ati patimokkhaḥ eva pātimokkhaḥ sabba guṇānam

original: vā mūlabhāvato uttamaṭṭhena pati ca so yathāvuttaṭṭhena mokkho cāti patimokkho, patimokkho
analyzed: vā mūla bhāvataḥ uttama ṭṭhena ca saḥ yathāvutta ṭṭhena mokkho ca ati patimokkho patimokkho

original: eva pātimokkho. Tathā hi vuttaṃ “pātimokkhanti ādimetaṃ mukhametaṃ pamukhameta”nti vitthāro.

original: 54. Dutiye bahuso loke na ciṇṇā na pavattā manussāti āciṇṇamanussā. Kadācideva hi nesaṃ loke nibbatti abhūtapubbā bhūtāti abbhutamanussā.
analyzed: dutiye bahusas loke na ciṇṇāḥ na pavattāḥ manussā ati āciṇṇa manussā kadācid eva hi nesam loke nibbatti abhūta pubbā bhūtā ati abbhuta manussā

analyzed: paccaya visesam kutas pana itam channam dhātūnam ti avibhāgena vutta ttā tena āha idam

original: Titthāyatanasuttavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.

original: 2. Bhayasuttavaṇṇanā

original: vippasannāni. Vippasannānīti ca pakatiākāraṃ atikkamitvā vippasannānīti attho. Nanu

original: na passati, kassaci kiñcanatasminti attano attānaṃ kassaci parassa kiñcanabhāve upanetabbaṃ
analyzed: na passati kassaci kiñcana tasmin ti attanaḥ attānam kassaci parassa kiñcana bhāve upanetabbam

original: na passati, bhātiṭṭhāne bhātaraṃ, sahāyaṭṭhāne sahāyaṃ, parikkhāraṭṭhāne parikkhāraṃ
analyzed: na passati bhāti ṭṭhāne bhātaram sahāya ṭṭhāne sahāyam parikkhāra ṭṭhāne parikkhāram

original: maññitvā upanetabbaṃ na passatīti attho. Na ca mama kvacanīti ettha mama-saddaṃ tāva
analyzed: maññitvā upanetabbam na passati iti atthaḥ na ca mama kvacani iti ettha mamasaddam tāva

original: ṭhapetvā kvacani parassa ca attānaṃ kvaci na passatīti ayamattho. Idāni mama-saddaṃ
analyzed: ṭhapetvā kvacani parassa ca attānam kvaci na passati iti ayam atthaḥ idāni mamasaddam

original: āharitvā “mama kismiñci kiñcanatatthī”ti so parassa attānaṃ “mama kismiñci kiñcanabhāvena
analyzed: āharitvā mama kismiñci kiñcana tatthi iti so parassa attānam mama kismiñci kiñcana bhāvena

original: atthī”ti na passati, attano bhātikaṭṭhāne bhātaraṃ, sahāyaṭṭhāne sahāyaṃ, parikkhāraṭṭhāne
analyzed: atthi iti na passati attanaḥ bhātika ṭṭhāne bhātaram sahāya ṭṭhāne sahāyam parikkhāra ṭṭhāne

original: parikkhāranti kismiñci ṭhāne parassa attānaṃ iminā kiñcanabhāvena upanetabbaṃ na
analyzed: parikkhāranti kismiñci ṭhāne parassa attānam iminā kiñcana bhāvena upanetabbam na

original: passatīti attho. Evamayaṃ yasmā neva katthaci attānaṃ passati, na taṃ parassa kiñcanabhāve
analyzed: passati iti atthaḥ evam ayam yasmā na iva katthaci attānam passati na tam parassa kiñcana bhāve

original: upanetabbaṃ passati. Na katthaci parassa attānaṃ passati, na parassa attānaṃ attano
analyzed: upanetabbam passati na katthaci parassa attānam passati na parassa attānam attano

original: kiñcanabhāve upanetabbaṃ passati, tasmā ayaṃ suññatā catukoṭikāti veditabbā.
analyzed: kiñcana bhāve upanetabbam passati tasmai ayam suñña tā catu koṭikā ati veditabbā

original: Yasmā pana micchādiṭṭhikānaṃ yāthāvadassanassa asambhavato yathāvuttacatukoṭikasuññatādassanaṃ
analyzed: yasmā pana micchādiṭṭhikānam yāthāva dassanassa asambhavataḥ yathā vutta catu koṭika suñña tā dassanam

original: na sambhavati, tasmā “natthi mātā, natthi pitā”tiādivacanaṃ viya micchāgāhavasena
analyzed: na sambhavati tasmā natthi mātā natthi pitā ati ādi vacanam micchā gāha vasena

original: “nāhaṃ kvacanī”tiādi vuttanti yutto cettha musāvādasambhavo. Katthacīti ṭhāne, kāle
analyzed: na aham kvacana itiādi vuttanti yutto ca ittha musāvāda sambhavo katthaci iti ṭhāne kāle

original: vā. Atha “nipphalo”ti kasmā vuttaṃ. “Na mahapphalo”ti saddena hi mahapphalābhāvova
analyzed: vā atha nipphalaḥ ti kasmā vuttam na mahapphalaḥ ti saddena hi mahat phala abhāvaḥ uva

original: jotito, na pana sabbathā phalābhāvoti āha “byañjanameva hi ettha sāvasesa”ntiādi.
analyzed: jotitaḥ na pana sabbathā phala abhāvaḥ ti āha byañjanam eva hi ettha sa avasesa ntiādi

original: Sesapadesupīti “na mahānisaṃso”tiādīsupi.
analyzed: sesa pade supi iti na mahānisaṃsa uti ādīsupi

original: Aṭṭhahi kāraṇehīti –
analyzed: aṭṭhahi kāraṇehi iti

original: panetarahi aññatra tena bhagavatā”ti –
analyzed: pana itarahi aññatra tena bhagavatā ati

analyzed: buddha guṇā dīpitā tasmā tena dīpita guṇe sandhāya aṭṭhahi kāraṇehi iti vuttam ti

original: Arahantiādīhi pāṭiyekkaguṇāva niddiṭṭhāti arahantiādīhi ekekehi padehi ekeke guṇāva niddiṭṭhāti attho.

original: Sahatantikanti pāḷidhammasahitaṃ. Purimanayeneva yojanā kātabbāti “kiliṭṭhasmiñhi kāye pasādhanaṃ pasādhetvā nakkhattaṃ kīḷamānā na sobhantī”tiādinā nayena yojanā kātabbāti attho.

original: Saṅghassa anussaraṇaṃ nāma tassa guṇānussaraṇamevāti āha “aṭṭhannaṃ ariyapuggalānaṃ

analyzed: sedana vasena gāhāpitam usumam purima nayena iva yojanā kātabbā ati kiliṭṭhasmin hi vatthe

original: Atha vā pāṇo atipātīyati etenāti pāṇātipāto, pāṇaghātahetubhūto dhammasamūho. Ko

analyzed: viratā avāti avadhāraṇena tassāḥ viratiyā kāla ādi vasena yathā

original: Sabbapāṇabhūtahitānukampīti etena tassā viratiyā pavattavasena apariyantataṃ dasseti.

original: saddhiṃ diyaḍḍhakilesasahassaṃ. Lokanirodhoti nibbānaṃ. Sacchikatoti attapaccakkho
analyzed: saddhim diyaḍḍha kilesa sahassam loka nirodho ti nibbānam sacchikato ti atta paccakkho

original: kato. Lokanirodhagāminī paṭipadāti sīlādikkhandhattayasaṅgaho ariyo aṭṭhaṅgiko maggo.
analyzed: kataḥ loka nirodha gāminī paṭipadā ati sīla ādi kkhandha ttaya saṅgahaḥ ariyaḥ aṭṭhaṅgikaḥ maggo

original: So hi lokanirodhaṃ nibbānaṃ gacchati adhigacchati, tadatthaṃ ariyehi paṭipajjīyati
analyzed: saḥ hi loka nirodham nibbānam gacchati adhigacchati tad attham ariyehi paṭipajjīyati

original: cāti lokanirodhagāminī paṭipadāti vuccati.
analyzed: ca ati loka nirodha gāminī paṭipadā ati vuccati

original: Ettāvatā tathāni abhisambuddho yāthāvato gatoti tathāgatoti ayamattho dassito hoti. Cattāri hi ariyasaccāni tathāni nāma. Yathāha –
analyzed: ettāvatā tathāni abhisambuddhaḥ yāthāvataḥ gataḥ ti tathāgataḥ ti ayam atthaḥ dassitaḥ hoti cattāri hi ariya saccāni tathāni nāma yathā āha

original: “Cattārimāni, bhikkhave, tathāni avitathāni anaññathāni. Katamāni cattāri? Idaṃ dukkhanti, bhikkhave, tathametaṃ avitathametaṃ anaññathameta”nti vitthāro.
analyzed: cattāri imāni bhikkhave tathāni avitathāni anaññathāni katamāni cattāri idam dukkhan ti bhikkhave tatham etam avitatham etam anaññatham etam ti vitthāraḥ

original: Apica tathāya gatoti tathāgato, gatoti ca avagato atīto patto paṭipannoti attho.
analyzed: apica tathāya gataḥ ti tathāgataḥ gataḥ iti ca avagataḥ atītaḥ patto paṭipanno ti attho

original: Idaṃ vuttaṃ hoti – yasmā bhagavā sakalalokaṃ tīraṇapariññāya tathāya aviparītāya
analyzed: idam vuttam hoti yasmai bhagavā sakala lokam tīraṇa pariññāya tathāya aviparītāya

original: gato avagato, tasmā loko tathāgatena abhisambuddhoti tathāgato. Lokasamudayaṃ pahānapariññāya
analyzed: gataḥ avagataḥ tasmā lokaḥ tathāgatena abhisambuddhaḥ iti tathāgataḥ loka samudayam pahāna pariññāya

original: tathāya gato atītoti tathāgato. Lokanirodhaṃ sacchikiriyāya tathāya gato pattoti
analyzed: tathāya gataḥ atītaḥ iti tathāgataḥ loka nirodham sacchikiriyāya tathāya gataḥ patto ti

original: tathāgato. Lokanirodhagāminiṃ paṭipadaṃ tathaṃ aviparītaṃ gato paṭipannoti tathāgatoti.
analyzed: tathāgataḥ loka nirodha gāminim paṭipadam aviparītam gataḥ paṭipannaḥ iti tathāgataḥ iti

original: Evaṃ imissā pāḷiyā tathāgatabhāvadīpanavasena attho veditabbo.
analyzed: evam imissā pāḷiyā tathāgata bhāva dīpana vasena atthaḥ veditabbo

original: Iti bhagavā catusaccābhisambodhavasena attano tathāgatabhāvaṃ pakāsetvā idāni tattha
analyzed: iti bhagavā catu sacca abhisambodha vasena tathāgata bhāvam pakāsetvā idāni tattha

original: diṭṭhādiabhisambodhavasenapi taṃ dassetuṃ “yaṃ, bhikkhave”tiādimāha. Aṭṭhakathāyaṃ
analyzed: diṭṭha ādi abhisambodha vasena api tam dassetum yam bhikkhave ti ādim āha aṭṭhakathāyam

original: pana “catūhi saccehi attano buddhabhāvaṃ kathetvā”ti vuttaṃ, taṃ tathāgatasaddabuddhasaddānaṃ
analyzed: pana catūhi saccehi attanaḥ buddha bhāvam kathetvā iti vuttam tam tathāgata sadda buddha saddānam

original: atthato ninnānākaraṇataṃ dassetuṃ vuttaṃ. Tathā ceva hi pāḷi pavattāti. Diṭṭhanti
analyzed: atthataḥ ninnānākaraṇatam dassetum vuttam tathā ca iva hi pāḷi pavattā iti diṭṭhan ti

original: rūpāyatanaṃ daṭṭhabbato. Tena yaṃ diṭṭhaṃ yaṃ dissati, yaṃ dakkhati, yaṃ samavāye
analyzed: rūpa āyatanam daṭṭhabbataḥ tena yam diṭṭham yam dissati yam dakkhati yam samavāye

original: passeyya, taṃ sabbaṃ diṭṭhanteva gahitaṃ kālavisesassa anāmaṭṭhabhāvato yathā “duddha”nti
analyzed: passeyya tam sabbam diṭṭhantā iva gahitam kāla visesassa anāmaṭṭha bhāvataḥ yathā duddhanti

original: dasseti. Sutantiādīsupi eseva nayo. Sutanti saddāyatanaṃ sotabbato. Mutanti sanissaye
analyzed: dassa iti sutanti ādīsu pi esa iva nayaḥ sutanti sadda āyatanam sotabbataḥ mutanti sa nissaye

original: indriye nissayaṃ muñcitvā pāpuṇitvā gahetabbaṃ. Tenāha “patvā gahetabbato”ti. Viññātanti
analyzed: indriye nissayam muñcitvā pāpuṇitvā gahetabbam tena āha patvā gahetabbato ti viññātam ti

original: vijānitabbaṃ. Taṃ pana diṭṭhādivinimuttaṃ viññeyyanti āha “sukhadukkhādi dhammārammaṇa”nti.
analyzed: vijānitabbam tam pana diṭṭha ādi vinimuttam viññeyyanti āha sukha dukkha ādi dhamma ārammaṇanti

original: Pattanti yathā tathā patvā hatthagataṃ, adhigatanti attho. Tenāha “pariyesitvā vā
analyzed: yathā tathā patvā hattha gatam adhigatam ti attho tena āha pariyesitvā vā

original: apariyesitvā vā”ti. Pariyesitanti pattiyā atthaṃ pariyiṭṭhaṃ. Taṃ pana pattaṃ vā
analyzed: a pariyesitvā vā ati pariyesitanti pattiyāḥ attham pariyiṭṭham tam pana pattam vā

original: siyā appattaṃ vā, ubhayathāpi pariyesitamevāti āha “pattaṃ vā appattaṃ vā”ti. Dvayenapi
analyzed: siyā appattam vā ubhayathā api pariyesitam eva ati āha pattam vā appattam vā iti dvayena api

original: dvippakārampi pattaṃ dvippakārampi pariyesitaṃ tena tena pakārena tathāgatena abhisambuddhanti
analyzed: dvi pakāram pi pattam dvi pakāram pi pariyesitam tena tena pakārena tathāgatena abhisambuddhanti

original: dasseti. Cittena anusañcaritanti te pana apāpetvā citteneva anu anu sañcaritaṃ, viparitakkitanti attho.
analyzed: dasseti cittena anusañcaritanti te pana a pāpetvā cittena iva anu anu sañcaritam viparitakkitam ti attho

original: Pītakantiādīti ādisaddena lohitaodātādisabbaṃ rūpārammaṇabhāgaṃ saṅgaṇhāti. Sumanoti
analyzed: pīta kanti ādi iti ādi saddena lohita odāta ādi sabbam rūpa ārammaṇa bhāgam saṅgaṇhāti sumano ti

original: rāgavasena lobhavasena saddhādivasena vā sumano. Dummanoti byāpādavitakkavasena vā
analyzed: rāga vasena lobha vasena saddhā ādi vasena vā su mano dummano ti byāpāda vitakka vasena vā

original: vihiṃsāvitakkavasena vā dummano. Majjhattoti aññāṇavasena, ñāṇavasena vā majjhatto.
analyzed: vihiṃsā vitakka vasena vā dummanaḥ majjhatto ti aññāṇa vasena ñāṇa vasena vā majjhatto

original: Esa nayo sabbattha. Tattha ādisaddena saṅkhasaddo, paṇavasaddo, pattagandho, pupphagandho,
analyzed: esa nayaḥ sabbattha tattha ādi saddena saṅkha saddo paṇava saddo patta gandho puppha gandho

original: puppharaso, phalaraso, upādinnaṃ, anupādinnaṃ, majjhattavedanā kusalakammaṃ akusalakammanti
analyzed: puppha rasaḥ phala rasaḥ upādinnam anupādinnam majjhatta vedanā kusala kammam akusala kammanti

original: evamādīnaṃ saṅgaho daṭṭhabbo. Appattanti ñāṇena asampattaṃ, aviditanti attho. Tenāha
analyzed: evamādīnam saṅgahaḥ daṭṭhabbo appattam ti ñāṇena asampattam aviditam ti attho tena āha

original: “ñāṇena asacchikata”nti. Lokena gatanti lokena ñātaṃ. Tatheva gatattāti tatheva ñātattā
analyzed: ñāṇena asat śikatanti lokena gatanti lokena ñātam tathā iva gatattā ati tathā iva ñātattā

original: abhisambuddhattā, gatasaddena ekattaṃ buddhiatthanti attho. Gatiattho hi dhātavo
analyzed: abhisambuddha ttā gata saddena ekattam buddhi atthan ti atthaḥ gati atthaḥ hi dhātavaḥ

original: buddhiatthā bhavantīti akkharacintakā.
analyzed: buddhi atthāḥ bhavanti iti akkhara cintakā

original: Yañca, bhikkhave, ratiṃ tathāgato anuttaraṃ sammāsambodhiṃ abhisambujjhatīti yassañca
analyzed: yat ca bhikkhave ratim tathāgataḥ anuttaram sammāsambodhim abhisambujjhati iti

original: visākhapuṇṇamāya rattiyaṃ tathāāgatattādiatthena tathāgato bhagavā bodhimaṇḍe aparājitapallaṅke
analyzed: visākhapuṇṇamāya rattiyam tathāāgata tta ādi atthena tathāgataḥ bhagavā bodhimaṇḍe aparājita pallaṅke

original: nisinno tiṇṇaṃ mārānaṃ matthakaṃ madditvā uttaritarābhāvato anuttaraṃ sammāsambodhiṃ
analyzed: nisinnaḥ tiṇṇam mārānam matthakam madditvā uttaritara abhāvataḥ anuttaram sammāsambodhim

original: āsavakkhayañāṇena saddhiṃ sabbaññutaññāṇaṃ adhigacchati. Yañca rattiṃ anupādisesāya
analyzed: āsava kkhaya ñāṇena saddhim sabbaññuta ññāṇam adhigacchati yat ca rattim an upādisesāya

original: nibbānadhātuyā parinibbāyatīti yassañca visākhapuṇṇamāya rattiyaṃyeva kusinārāyaṃ
analyzed: nibbāna dhātuyā parinibbāyati iti yassan ca visākhapuṇṇamāya rattiyaṃya iva kusinārāyam

original: upavattane mallānaṃ sālavane yamakasālānamantare anupādisesāya nibbānadhātuyā parinibbāyati.
analyzed: upavattane mallānam sāla vane yamaka sālānam antare an upādisesāya nibbānadhātuyā parinibbāyati

original: Yaṃ etasmiṃ antareti imāsaṃ dvinnaṃ saupādisesaanupādisesanibbānadhātūnaṃ majjhe
analyzed: yam etasmin antareti imāsam dvinnam sa aupādisesa anupādisesa nibbānadhātūnam majjhe

original: pañcacattālīsavassaparimāṇakāle paṭhamabodhiyampi majjhimabodhiyampi pacchimabodhiyampi
analyzed: pañcacattālīsa vassa parimāṇa kāle paṭhama bodhiyam pi majjhima bodhiyam pi pacchima bodhiyam pi

original: yaṃ suttageyyādippabhedaṃ dhammaṃ bhāsati nidassanavasena, lapati uddisanavasena,
analyzed: yam sutta geyya ādi ppabhedam dhammam bhāsati nidassana vasena lapati uddisana vasena

original: niddisati pariniddisanavasena. Sabbaṃ taṃ tatheva hotīti taṃ etthantare desitaṃ sabbaṃ
analyzed: niddisati pariniddisana vasena sabbam tam tathā iva hoti iti tam etthantare desitam sabbam

original: suttageyyādinavaṅgaṃ buddhavacanaṃ atthato byañjanato ca anūnaṃ anadhikaṃ sabbākāraparipuṇṇaṃ
analyzed: sutta geyya ādi nava aṅgam buddha vacanam atthataḥ byañjanataḥ ca anūnam anadhikam sabba ākāra paripuṇṇam

original: rāgamadanimmadanaṃ dosamadanimmadanaṃ mohamadanimmadanaṃ, natthi tattha vālaggamattampi
analyzed: rāga mada nimmadanam dosa mada nimmadanam moha mada nimmadanam na atthi tattha vā ālagga mattam pi

original: avakkhalitaṃ, ekamuddikāya lañchitaṃ viya ekāya nāḷiyā mitaṃ viya ekatulāya tulitaṃ
analyzed: avakkhalitam eka muddikāya lañchitam viya ekāya nāḷiyā mitam viya eka tulāya tulitam

original: viya ca taṃ tatheva hoti yassatthāya bhāsitaṃ, ekanteneva tassa sādhanato, no aññathā,
analyzed: viya ca tam tathā iva hoti yassa atthāya bhāsitam ekantena iva tassa sādhanataḥ no aññathā

original: tasmā tathaṃ avitathaṃ anaññathaṃ. Etena tathāvāditāya tathāgatoti dasseti. Gadaattho
analyzed: tasmā tatham a vitatham anaññatham etena tathāvāditāya tathāgataḥ ti dasseti gada attho

original: ayaṃ gatasaddo da-kārassa ta-kāraṃ katvā, tasmā tathaṃ gadatīti tathāgatoti attho.
analyzed: ayam gata saddaḥ dakārassa takāram katvā tasmā tatham gadati iti tathāgataḥ ti attho

original: Atha vā āgadanaṃ āgado, vacananti attho. Tato aviparīto āgado assāti da-kārassa ta-kāraṃ
analyzed: atha vā āgadanam āgadaḥ vacananti attho tatas aviparītaḥ āgadaḥ assa ati dakārassa takāram

original: katvā tathāgatoti evamettha padasiddhi veditabbā.
analyzed: katvā tathāgataḥ iti evam ettha pada siddhi veditabbā

original: Yathāvādīti ye dhamme bhagavā “ime dhammā akusalā sāvajjā viññugarahitā samattā samādinnā
analyzed: yathāvādi iti ye dhamme bhagavā ime dhammāḥ akusalā sāvajjā viññuga rahitā samattā samādinnā

original: ahitāya dukkhāya saṃvattantī”ti paresaṃ dhammaṃ desento vadati, te dhamme ekanteneva
analyzed: ahitāya dukkhāya saṃvattanti iti paresam dhammam desentaḥ vadati te dhamme ekantena iva

original: sayaṃ pahāsi. Ye pana dhamme bhagavā – “ime dhammā kusalā anavajjā viññuppasatthā
analyzed: sayam pahāsi ye pana dhamme bhagavā ime dhammā kusalāḥ anavajjāḥ viññu pasatthā

original: samattā samādinnā hitāya sukhāya saṃvattantī”ti vadati, te dhamme ekanteneva sayaṃ
analyzed: samattā samādinnā hitāya sukhāya saṃvattanti iti vadati te dhamme ekantena iva sayam

original: upasampajja viharati, tasmā yathāvādī bhagavā tathākārīti veditabbo. Tathā sammadeva
analyzed: upasampajja viharati tasmai yathāvādī bhagavā tathākārī iti veditabbaḥ tathā sammat eva

original: sīlādiparipūraṇavasena sammāpaṭipadāyaṃ yathākārī bhagavā, tatheva dhammadesanāya
analyzed: sīla ādi paripūraṇa vasena sammā paṭipadā ayam yathā kārī bhagavā tathā iva dhamma desanāya

original: paresaṃ tattha patiṭṭhāpanavasena tathāvādī. Bhagavato hi vācāya kāyo anulometi,
analyzed: paresam tattha patiṭṭhāpana vasena tathāvādī bhagavataḥ hi vācāya kāyaḥ anulomā iti

original: kāyassapi vācā, tasmā yathāvādī tathākārī, yathākārī tathāvādī ca hoti. Evaṃbhūtassa
analyzed: kāyassa api vācā tasmai yathāvādī tathākārī yathākārī tathāvādī ca hoti evaṃbhūtassa

original: ca yathā vācā, kāyopi tathā gato pavatto. Yathā ca kāyo, vācāpi tathā gatā pavattāti attho.
analyzed: ca yathā vācā kāyaḥ api tathā gato pavatto yathā ca kāyaḥ vācā api tathā gatā pavattā ati attho

original: Abhibhū anabhibhūtoti upari bhavaggaṃ, heṭṭhā avīcinirayaṃ pariyantaṃ katvā tiriyaṃ
analyzed: upari bhavaggam heṭṭhā avīci nirayam pariyantam katvā tiriyam

original: aparimāṇāsu lokadhātūsu bhagavā sabbasatte abhibhavati sīlenapi samādhināpi paññāyapi
analyzed: aparimāṇāsu lokadhātūsu bhagavā sabba satte abhibhavati sīlena api samādhinā api paññāya api

original: vimuttiyāpi, na tassa tulā vā pamāṇaṃ vā atthi. Asamo asamasamo appaṭimo appaṭibhāgo
analyzed: vimuttiyā api na tassa tulā vā pamāṇam vā atthi asamaḥ asamasamaḥ appaṭimaḥ appaṭibhāgo

original: appaṭipuggalo atulo appameyyo anuttaro dhammarājā devadevo sakkānaṃ atisakko brahmānaṃ
analyzed: appaṭipuggalaḥ atulaḥ appameyyaḥ anuttaraḥ dhamma rājā devadevaḥ sakkānam atisakkaḥ brahmānam

original: atibrahmā, tato eva ayaṃ na kenaci abhibhūto. Dakkhatīti sabbaṃ passati. Visesavacanicchāyapi
analyzed: atibrahmā tatas eva ayam na kenacid abhibhūtaḥ dakkhati iti sabbam passati

original: abhāvato anavasesavisayo dasasaddo. Tena yaṃ kiñci neyyaṃ nāma, sabbaṃ taṃ hatthatale
analyzed: abhāvataḥ anavasesa visayaḥ dasa saddo tena yam kiñci neyyam nāma sabbam tam hattha tale

original: āmalakaṃ viya passatīti dīpeti. Aviparītaṃ āsayādiavabodhena hitūpasaṃhārādinā ca
analyzed: āmalakam viya passati iti dīpeti aviparītam āsaya ādi avabodhena hitu upasaṃhāra ādinā ca

original: satte, bhāvaññatthattūpanayavasena saṅkhāre, sabbākārena suciṇṇavasitāya samāpattiyo,
analyzed: satte bhāvaññatthattu upanaya vasena saṅkhāre sabba ākārena su ciṇṇa vasitāya samāpattiyaḥ

original: cittañca vase vattetīti vasavattīti evamettha attho daṭṭhabbo.
analyzed: cittam ca vase vattā iti iti vasa vattī iti evam ettha atthaḥ daṭṭhabbo

original: Visaṃyuttoti catūhi yogehi visaṃyutto. Tenāha “catunnaṃ yogānaṃ pahānena visaṃyutto”ti. Taṇhādiṭṭhiupayehi virahitoti sabbasmimpi loke taṇhādiṭṭhisaṅkhātehi upayehi virahito.
analyzed: visaṃyuttaḥ ti catūhi yogehi visaṃyuttaḥ tena āha catunnam yogānam pahānena visaṃyuttaḥ ti taṇhā diṭṭhi upayehi virahito ti sabbasmim pi loke taṇhā diṭṭhi saṅkhātehi upayehi virahitaḥ

original: Abhibhavitvā ṭhitoti tabbisayakilesappahānena abhibhuyya atikkamitvā ṭhito. Cattāropi
analyzed: abhibhavitvā ṭhito ti tad visaya kilesa pahānena abhibhuyya atikkamitvā ṭhito cattāro api

original: ganthe mocetvā ṭhitoti sabbe abhijjhākāyaganthādike sakasantānato mocetvā ṭhito.
analyzed: ganthe mocetvā ṭhitaḥ ti sabbe abhijjhā kāya gantha ādike saka santānataḥ mocetvā ṭhitaḥ

original: Veneyyasantāne vā attano desanāvilāsena tesaṃ pamocanoti sabbaganthappamocano. Phuṭṭhassa
analyzed: veneyya santāne vā attanaḥ desanā vilāsena tesam pamocano ti sabba gantha pamocano phuṭṭhassa

original: paramā santīti assa anena khīṇāsavena buddhena paramā santi ñāṇaphusanena phuṭṭhāti
analyzed: paramā santi iti assa anena khīṇāsavena buddhena paramā santi ñāṇa phusanena phuṭṭhā ati

original: evamettha sambandho veditabbo. Tenāha “phuṭṭhassā”tiādi. Nibbāne kutoci bhayaṃ natthīti
analyzed: evam ettha sambandhaḥ veditabbaḥ tena āha phuṭṭhassa atiādi nibbāne kutoci bhayam natthi iti

original: kutoci bhayakāraṇato nibbāne bhayaṃ natthi asaṅkhatabhāvena sabbaso khemattā. Tenāha
analyzed: kutoci bhaya kāraṇataḥ nibbāne bhayam natthi asaṅkhata bhāvena sabbaso khema ttā tena āha

original: bhagavā – “khemañca vo, bhikkhave, dhammaṃ desessāmi khemagāminiñca paṭipada”ntiādi.
analyzed: bhagavā khemam ca vaḥ bhikkhave dhammam desessāmi khema gāminim ca paṭipadam tiādi

original: Nibbānappattassa vā kutoci bhayaṃ natthīti nibbānaṃ akutobhayanti evamettha attho
analyzed: nibbāna ppattassa vā kutoci bhayam na atthi iti nibbānam akutobhayanti evam ettha atthaḥ

original: daṭṭhabbo, na kutoci bhayaṃ ettha etasmiṃ adhigateti akutobhayaṃ, nibbānanti evamettha
analyzed: daṭṭhabbaḥ na kutoci bhayam ettha etasmin adhigatā iti akutobhayam nibbānam ti evam ettha

original: nibbacanañca daṭṭhabbaṃ.
analyzed: nibbacanam ca daṭṭhabbam

original: Anīgho niddukkho. Sabbakammakkhayaṃ pattoti sabbesaṃ kammānaṃ khayaṃ pariyosānaṃ
analyzed: anīghaḥ niddukkhaḥ sabba kamma kkhayam patto ti sabbesam kammānam khayam pariyosānam

original: idha icchitabhāvaṃ dassento “atha kho”tiādimāha. Nanu ca yathāladdhādayopi thūlādayo

original: Santuṭṭho hoti vaṇṇavādīti ettha catukkoṭikaṃ sambhavati. Tattha catutthoyeva pakkho
analyzed: santuṭṭhaḥ hoti vaṇṇa vādī iti ettha catukkoṭikam sambhavati tattha catutthaḥ eva pakkho

original: vaṇṇitathomitoti tathā desanā katā. Eko santuṭṭho hoti, santosassa vaṇṇaṃ na katheti
analyzed: vaṇṇita thomitaḥ ti tathā desanā katā ekaḥ santuṭṭhaḥ hoti santosassa vaṇṇam na katheti

original: seyyathāpi thero nāḷako. Eko na santuṭṭho hoti, santosassa vaṇṇaṃ katheti seyyathāpi
analyzed: seyyathāpi theraḥ nāḷakaḥ ekaḥ na santuṭṭhaḥ hoti santosassa vaṇṇam katheti seyyathāpi

original: upanando sakyaputto. Eko neva santuṭṭho hoti, na santosassa vaṇṇaṃ katheti seyyathāpi
analyzed: upanandaḥ sakya putto ekaḥ na iva santuṭṭhaḥ hoti na santosassa vaṇṇam katheti seyyathā api

original: thero lāḷudāyi. Eko santuṭṭho ceva hoti, santosassa ca vaṇṇaṃ katheti seyyathāpi thero mahākassapo.
analyzed: theraḥ lāḷudāyi ekaḥ santuṭṭhaḥ ca iva hoti santosassa ca vaṇṇam katheti seyyathā api theraḥ mahākassapo

original: Anesananti ayuttaṃ esanaṃ. Tenāha “appatirūpa”nti, sāsane ṭhitānaṃ appatirūpaṃ ayoggaṃ.
analyzed: anesanam ti ayuttam esanam tena āha appatirūpam ti sāsane ṭhitānam appatirūpam ayoggam

original: Kohaññaṃ karontoti cīvaruppādananimittaṃ paresaṃ kuhanaṃ vimhāpanaṃ karonto. Uttasatīti
analyzed: kohaññam karonto ti cīvara uppādana nimittam paresam kuhanam vimhāpanam karonto uttasati iti

original: taṇhāsantāsena uparūpari tasati. Paritassatīti parito tassati. Yathā sabbe kāyavacippayogā
analyzed: taṇhā santāsena upari upari tasati paritassati iti paritassati yathā sabbe kāya vaci payogā

original: tadatthā eva jāyanti, evaṃ sabbabhāgehi tasati. Gadhitaṃ vuccati giddho, so cettha
analyzed: tad atthāḥ eva jāyanti evam sabba bhāgehi tasati gadhitam vuccati giddho saḥ ca ittha

original: abhijjhālakkhaṇo adhippeto. Gadhitaṃ etassa natthīti agadhitoti āha “vigatalobhagiddho”ti.
analyzed: abhijjhā lakkhaṇaḥ adhippetaḥ gadhitam etassa na atthi iti agadhitaḥ ti āha vigata lobha giddhaḥ ti

original: Mucchanti taṇhāvasena muyhanaṃ. Tassa samussayassa adhigataṃ anāpanno anupagato.
analyzed: mucchanti taṇhā vasena muyhanam tassa samussayassa adhigatam an āpannaḥ an upagataḥ

original: Anotthato anajjhotthato. Apariyonaddhoti taṇhacchadanena acchādito. Ādīnavaṃ passamānoti
analyzed: an otthataḥ an ajjhotthataḥ a pariyonaddhaḥ ti taṇha chadanena a chāditaḥ ādīnavam passamānaḥ ti

original: diṭṭhadhammikaṃ samparāyikañca dosaṃ passanto. Gadhitaparibhogato nissarati etenāti
analyzed: diṭṭhadhammikam samparāyikam ca dosam passantaḥ gadhita paribhogataḥ nissarati etena ati

original: nissaraṇaṃ, idamaṭṭhikatā. Taṃ pajānātīti nissaraṇapañño. Tenāha “yāvadeva…pe… jānanto”ti.
analyzed: nissaraṇam idam aṭṭhika tā tam pajānāti iti nissaraṇa pañño tena āha yāvat evape jānanto ti

original: Nevattānukkaṃsetīti attānaṃ neva ukkaṃseti na ukkhipati na ukkaṭṭhato dahati. Ahantiādi
analyzed: na iva attā anukkaṃseti iti attānam na iva ukkaṃseti na ukkhipati na ukkaṭṭhataḥ dahati ahantiādi

original: ukkaṃsanākāradassanaṃ. Na vambheti na hīḷeti na nihīnato dahati. Tasmiṃ cīvarasantoseti
analyzed: ukkaṃsana ākāra dassanam na vambheti na hīḷeti na nihīnataḥ dahati tasmim cīvara santoseti

original: tasmiṃ yathāvutte vīsatividhe cīvarasantose. Kāmañcettha vuttappakārasantosaggahaṇeneva
analyzed: tasmin yathā vutte vīsatividhe cīvara santose kāmam ca itthā vutta ppakāra santosa ggahaṇena iva

original: cīvarahetu anesanāpajjanādipi gahitameva tasmiṃ sati tassa bhāvato, asati ca abhāvato.
analyzed: cīvara hetu gahitam eva tasmin sati tassa bhāvataḥ asati ca abhāvataḥ

original: Vaṇṇavāditāattukkaṃsanaparavambhanāni pana gahitāni na hontīti “vaṇṇavādādīsu vā”ti
analyzed: vaṇṇa vādi tā attukkaṃsana para vambhanāni pana gahitāni na honti iti vaṇṇa vāda ādīsu vāti

original: vikappo vutto. Ettha ca dakkhotiādi yesaṃ dhammānaṃ vasenassa yathāvuttasantosādī
analyzed: vikappaḥ vuttaḥ ettha ca dakkha uti ādi yesam dhammānam vasena assa yathā vutta santosa ādī

original: ijjhanti, taṃdassanaṃ. Tattha dakkhoti iminā tesaṃ samuṭṭhāpanapaññaṃ dasseti. Analasoti
analyzed: ijjhanti taṃdassanam tattha dakkho ti iminā tesam samuṭṭhāpana paññam dasseti analasaḥ ti

original: iminā paggaṇhanavīriyaṃ, sampajānoti iminā pārihāriyapaññaṃ, paṭissatoti iminā tattha
analyzed: iminā paggaṇhana vīriyam sampajānoti iminā pārihāriya paññam paṭissato ti iminā tattha

original: asammosavuttiṃ dasseti.
analyzed: asammosa vuttim dasseti

original: Piṇḍapāto jānitabboti pabhedato piṇḍapāto jānitabbo. Piṇḍapātakkhettanti piṇḍapātassa
analyzed: piṇḍapātaḥ jānitabboti pabhedataḥ piṇḍapātaḥ jānitabbo piṇḍapāta khettam piṇḍapātassa

original: uppattiṭṭhānaṃ. Piṇḍapātasantoso jānitabboti piṇḍapātasantosappabhedo jānitabbo.
analyzed: uppatti ṭṭhānam piṇḍapāta santosaḥ jānitabbo ti piṇḍapāta santosa ppabhedaḥ jānitabbo

original: Idha bhesajjampi piṇḍapātagatikameva. Āharitabbato hi sappiādīnampi gahaṇaṃ kataṃ.
analyzed: idha bhesajjam pi piṇḍapāta gatikam eva āharitabbataḥ hi sappi ādīnam pi gahaṇam katam

original: Piṇḍapātakkhettaṃ piṇḍapātassa uppattiṭṭhānaṃ khettaṃ viya khettaṃ. Uppajjati ettha,
analyzed: piṇḍapāta khettam piṇḍapātassa uppatti ṭhānam khettam viya khettam uppajjati ettha

original: etenāti ca uppattiṭṭhānaṃ. Saṅghato vā hi bhikkhuno piṇḍapāto uppajjati uddissavasena
analyzed: etena ati ca uppatti ṭṭhānam saṅghataḥ vā hi bhikkhuno piṇḍapātaḥ uppajjati uddissa vasena

original: vā. Tattha sakalassa saṅghassa dātabbabhattaṃ saṅghabhattaṃ. Katipaye bhikkhū uddisitvā
analyzed: vā tattha sakalassa saṅghassa dātabba bhattam saṅgha bhattam katipaye bhikkhū uddisitvā

original: uddesena dātabbabhattaṃ uddesabhattaṃ. Nimantetvā dātabbabhattaṃ nimantanaṃ. Salākāya
analyzed: uddesena dātabba bhattam uddesa bhattam nimantetvā dātabba bhattam nimantanam salākāya

original: dātabbabhattaṃ salākabhattaṃ. Ekasmiṃ pakkhe ekadivasaṃ dātabbabhattaṃ pakkhikaṃ.
analyzed: dātabba bhattam salāka bhattam ekasmin pakkhe eka divasam dātabba bhattam pakkhikam

original: Uposathe uposathe dātabbabhattaṃ uposathikaṃ. Pāṭipadadivase dātabbabhattaṃ pāṭipadikaṃ.
analyzed: uposathe uposathe dātabba bhattam uposathikam pāṭipada divase dātabba bhattam pāṭipadikam

original: Āgantukānaṃ dātabbabhattaṃ āgantukabhattaṃ. Dhuragehe eva ṭhapetvā dātabbabhattaṃ
analyzed: āgantukānam dātabba bhattam āgantuka bhattam dhura gehe eva ṭhapetvā dātabba bhattam

original: dhurabhattaṃ. Kuṭiṃ uddissa dātabbabhattaṃ kuṭibhattaṃ. Gāmavāsiādīhi vārena dātabbabhattaṃ
analyzed: dhura bhattam kuṭim uddissa dātabba bhattam kuṭibhattam gāmavāsi ādīhi vārena dātabba bhattam

original: vārabhattaṃ. Vihāraṃ uddissa dātabbabhattaṃ vihārabhattaṃ. Sesāni pākaṭāneva.
analyzed: vāra bhattam vihāram uddissa dātabba bhattam vihāra bhattam sesāni pākaṭāni eva

original: Vitakketi “kattha nu kho ahaṃ ajja piṇḍāya carissāmī”ti. “Sve kattha piṇḍāya carissāmā”ti
analyzed: vitakka iti kattha nu kho aham ajja piṇḍāya carissāmi iti sve kattha piṇḍāya carissāma ati

original: therena vutte “asukagāme, bhante”ti kāmametaṃ paṭivacanadānaṃ, yena pana cittena
analyzed: therena vutte asuka gāme bhante iti kāmam etam paṭivacana dānam yena pana cittena

original: cintetvā taṃ vuttaṃ, taṃ sandhāyāha “ettakaṃ cintetvā”ti. Tato paṭṭhāyāti vitakkamāḷake
analyzed: cintetvā tam vuttam tam sandhāya āha ettakam cintetvā iti tatas paṭṭhāya ati vitakka māḷake

original: ṭhatvā vitakkitakālato paṭṭhāya. Tato paraṃ vitakkento ariyavaṃsā cuto hotīti idaṃ
analyzed: ṭhatvā vitakkita kālato paṭṭhāya tato param vitakkento ariya vaṃsā cutaḥ hoti iti idam

original: tiṇṇampi ariyavaṃsikānaṃ vasena gahetabbaṃ, na ekacārikasseva. Sabbopi hi ariyavaṃsiko
analyzed: tiṇṇam pi ariyavaṃsikānam vasena gahetabbam na ekacārikassa iva sabbaḥ api hi ariyavaṃsiko

original: ekavārameva vitakketuṃ labhati, na tato paraṃ. Paribāhiroti ariyavaṃsikabhāvato bahibhūto.
analyzed: eka vāram eva vitakketum labhati na tatas param ariyavaṃsika bhāvataḥ bahibhūtaḥ

original: Svāyaṃ vitakkasantoso kammaṭṭhānamanasikārena na kuppati visujjhati ca. Ito paresupi
analyzed: su ayam vitakka santoso kammaṭṭhāna manasikārena na kuppati visujjhati ca itas paresu pi

original: eseva nayo. Tenevāha “kammaṭṭhānasīsena gantabba”nti. Gahetabbamevāti aṭṭhānappayutto
analyzed: esa eva nayaḥ tena iva āha kammaṭṭhāna sīsena gantabbanti gahetabbam eva ati aṭṭhāna ppayuttaḥ

original: eva-saddo. Yāpanamattameva gahetabbanti yojetabbaṃ.
analyzed: eva saddaḥ yāpana mattam eva gahetabbam iti yojetabbam

original: Etthāti etasmiṃ piṇḍapātappaṭiggahaṇe. Appanti attano yāpanappamāṇatopi appaṃ gahetabbaṃ
analyzed: ettha iti etasmim piṇḍapāta paṭiggahaṇe appanti attanaḥ yāpana ppamāṇataḥ pi appam gahetabbam

original: dāyakassa cittārādhanatthaṃ. Pamāṇenevāti attano pamāṇeneva appaṃ gahetabbaṃ. Pamāṇena
analyzed: dāyakassa citta ārādhana tham pamāṇena iva ati attanaḥ pamāṇena iva appam gahetabbam pamāṇena

original: gahetabbanti ettha kāraṇaṃ dassetuṃ “paṭiggahaṇasmiñhī”tiādi vuttaṃ. Makkhetīti viddhaṃseti
analyzed: gahetabbanti ettha kāraṇam dassetum paṭiggahaṇasmin hi itiādi vuttam makkheti iti

original: apaneti. Vinipāteti vināseti aṭṭhānaviniyogena. Sāsananti satthusāsanaṃ anusiṭṭhiṃ
analyzed: apaneti vinipāteti vināseti aṭṭhāna viniyogena sāsanan ti satthu sāsanam anusiṭṭhim

original: na karoti na paṭipajjati. Sapadānacārinā viya dvārapaṭipāṭiyā caraṇaṃ loluppavivajjanasantosoti
analyzed: na karoti na paṭipajjati sa padāna cārinā viya dvāra paṭipāṭiyā caraṇam loluppa vivajjana santosaḥ ti

original: āha “dvārapaṭipāṭiyā gantabba”nti.
analyzed: āha dvāra paṭipāṭiyā gantabbanti

original: Harāpetvāti adhikaṃ apanetvā. Āhāragedhato nissarati etenāti nissaraṇaṃ. Jighacchāya
analyzed: harāpetvā iti adhikam apanetvā āhāra gedhataḥ nissarati etena ati nissaraṇam jighacchāya

original: paṭivinodanatthaṃ katā, kāyassa ṭhitiādipayojanaṃ pana atthāpattito āgatamevāti āha
analyzed: paṭivinodana attham katā kāyassa ṭhiti ādi payojanam pana atthāpattitaḥ āgatam eva ati āha

original: “jighacchāya…pe… santoso nāmā”ti. Nidahitvā na paribhuñjitabbaṃ tadahupīti adhippāyo.
analyzed: santosaḥ nāma ati nidahitvā na paribhuñjitabbam adhippāyaḥ

original: Itarattha pana sikkhāpadeneva vāritaṃ. Sāraṇīyadhamme ṭhitenāti sīlavantehi bhikkhūhi
analyzed: itarattha pana sikkhāpadena iva vāritam sāraṇīya dhamme ṭhitena ati sīlavantehi bhikkhūhi

original: sādhāraṇabhogibhāve ṭhitena.
analyzed: sādhāraṇa bhogi bhāve ṭhitena

original: Senāsanenāti sayanena āsanena ca. Yattha yattha hi mañcādike vihārādike ca seti,
analyzed: senāsanena ati sayanena āsanena ca yattha yattha hi mañca ādike vihāra ādike ca

original: taṃ senaṃ. Yattha yattha pīṭhādike āsati, taṃ āsanaṃ. Tadubhayaṃ ekato katvā “senāsana”nti
analyzed: tam yattha yattha pīṭha ādike āsati tam āsanam tat ubhayam ekatas katvā

original: vuttaṃ. Tenāha “mañco”tiādi. Tattha mañco masārakādi. Tathā pīṭhaṃ. Mañcabhisi, pīṭhabhisīti
analyzed: vuttam tena āha mañca utiādi tattha mañcaḥ masāraka ādi tathā pīṭham mañca bhisi pīṭha bhisī iti

original: duvidho bhisi. Vihāro pākāraparicchinno sakalo āvāso, “dīghamukhapāsādo”ti keci.
analyzed: duvidhaḥ vihāro pākāra paricchinno sakalaḥ āvāsaḥ dīgha mukha pāsādaḥ iti keci

original: Aḍḍhayogo dīghapāsādo, “ekapassacchādanakasenāsana”nti keci. Pāsādoti caturassapāsādo,
analyzed: aḍḍha yogo dīgha pāsādaḥ eka passa chādanaka senāsananti keci pāsādo ti catur assa pāsādo

original: “āyatacaturassapāsādo”ti keci. Hammiyanti muṇḍacchadanapāsādo. Guhāti kevalā pabbataguhā.
analyzed: āyata catur assa pāsādaḥ ti keci hammiyanti muṇḍacchadana pāsādaḥ guhā ati kevalā pabbata guhā

original: Leṇaṃ dvārabandhaṃ. Aṭṭo bahalabhittikagehaṃ, yassa gopānasiyo aggahetvā iṭṭhakāhi
analyzed: leṇam dvāra bandham aṭṭaḥ bahala bhittika geham yassa gopānasiyaḥ aggahetvā

original: eva chadanaṃ hoti, “aṭṭalākārena karīyatī”tipi vadanti. Māḷo ekakūṭasaṅgahito anekakoṇo
analyzed: eva chadanam vadanti māḷaḥ eka kūṭa saṅgahitaḥ aneka koṇaḥ

original: paṭissayaviseso, “vaṭṭākārena katasenāsana”nti keci.
analyzed: paṭissaya visesaḥ vaṭṭa ākārena katasena āsananti keci

original: Piṇḍapāte vuttanayenevāti “sādako bhikkhu ‘ahaṃ kattha vasissāmī’ti vitakketī”tiādinā
analyzed: piṇḍapāte vutta nayena iva ati sādakaḥ bhikkhu aham kattha vasissāmi iti vitakketi itiādinā

original: yathārahaṃ piṇḍapāte vuttanayeneva veditabbā. “Tato paraṃ vitakkento ariyavaṃsā cuto
analyzed: yathāraham piṇḍapāte vutta nayena iva veditabbā tatas param vitakkentaḥ ariya vaṃsā cutaḥ

original: hoti paribāhiro, senāsanaṃ kuhiṃ labhissāmīti acintetvā kammaṭṭhānasīseneva gantabba”nti
analyzed: hoti paribāhiraḥ senāsanam kuhim labhissāmi iti a cintetvā kammaṭṭhāna sīsena iva gantabbanti

original: ca evamādi sabbaṃ purimanayeneva.
analyzed: ca evamādi sabbam purima nayena iva

original: Kasmā panettha paccayasantosaṃ dassentena bhagavatā gilānapaccayasantoso na gahitoti?
analyzed: kasmā pana ittha paccaya santosam dassentena bhagavatā gilāna paccaya santosaḥ na gahito ti

original: Na kho panetaṃ evaṃ daṭṭhabbanti dassento “gilānapaccayo pana piṇḍapāte eva paviṭṭho”ti
analyzed: na kho pana itam evam daṭṭhabbanti dassento gilāna paccayaḥ pana piṇḍapāte eva paviṭṭhaḥ ti

original: āha, āharitabbatāsāmaññenāti adhippāyo. Yadi evaṃ tatthāpi piṇḍapāte viya vitakkasantosādayopi
analyzed: āha āharitabba tā sāmaññena ati adhippāyaḥ yadi evam tattha api piṇḍapāte viya vitakka santosa ādayaḥ api

original: pannarasa santosā icchitabbāti? Noti dassento āha “tatthā”tiādi. Nanu cettha dvādaseva
analyzed: pannarasa santosāḥ icchitabbā ati no ti dassento āha tattha atiādi nanu ca ittha dvādasā iva

original: dhutaṅgāni viniyogaṃ gatāni, ekaṃ pana nesajjikaṅgaṃ na katthaci viniyuttanti āha
analyzed: dhutaṅgāni viniyogam gatāni ekam pana nesajjikaṅgam na katthaci viniyuttan ti āha

original: “nesajjikaṅgaṃ bhāvanārāmaariyavaṃsaṃ bhajatī”ti. Ayañca attho aṭṭhakathāruḷho evāti
analyzed: nesajji kaṅgam bhāvanā ārāma ariya vaṃsam bhajati iti ayaṃ ca atthaḥ aṭṭhakathā āruḷhaḥ evā ti

original: dassento “vuttampi ceta”ntiādimāha.
analyzed: dassentaḥ vuttam pi cetan ti ādim āha

original: Pathaviṃ pattharamāno viyātiādi ariyavaṃsadesanāya sudukkarabhāvadassanaṃ mahāvisayattā
analyzed: pathavim pattharamānaḥ viyāti ādi ariya vaṃsa desanāya su dukkara bhāva dassanam mahā visaya ttā

original: tassā desanāya. Yasmā nayasahassapaṭimaṇḍitaṃ hoti, ariyamaggādhigamāya vitthārato
analyzed: tassā desanāya yasmā naya sahassa paṭimaṇḍitam hoti ariya magga adhigamāya vitthārato

original: pavattiyamānā desanā cittuppādakaṇḍe ayañca bhāvanārāmaariyavaṃsakathā ariyamaggādhigamāya
analyzed: pavattiyamānā desanā cittuppāda kaṇḍe ayam ca bhāvanā ārāma ariya vaṃsa kathā ariya magga adhigamāya

original: vitthārato pavattiyamānā eva hotīti vuttaṃ “sahassanayapaṭimaṇḍitaṃ…pe… desanaṃ ārabhī”ti.
analyzed: vitthārato eva hoti iti vuttam desanam ārabhi iti

original: Paṭipakkhavidhamanato abhimukhabhāvena ramaṇaṃ āramaṇaṃ ārāmoti āha “abhiratīti attho”ti.
analyzed: paṭipakkha vidhamanataḥ abhimukha bhāvena ramaṇam āramaṇam ārāmaḥ iti āha abhirati iti attho ti

original: Byadhikaraṇānampi padānaṃ vasena bhavati bāhiratthasamāso yathā “urasilomo kaṇṭhekāḷo”ti
analyzed: byadhikaraṇānam pi padānam vasena bhavati bāhirattha samāsaḥ yathā

original: āha “bhāvanāya ārāmo assāti bhāvanārāmo”ti. Abhiramitabbaṭṭhena vā ārāmo, bhāvanā
analyzed: āha bhāvanāya ārāmaḥ assa ati bhāvanā ārāmaḥ ti abhiramitabba ṭṭhena vā ārāmaḥ bhāvanā

original: ārāmo assāti bhāvanārāmoti evampettha samāsayojanā veditabbā. Bhāvento ramatīti etena
analyzed: ārāmaḥ assa ati bhāvanā ārāmaḥ ti evam pi ittha samāsa yojanā veditabbā bhāventaḥ ramati iti etena

original: bhāvanārāmasaddānaṃ kattusādhanataṃ kammadhārayasamāsatañca dasseti. “Pajahanto ramatī”ti
analyzed: bhāvanā ārāma saddānam kattu sādhanatam kammadhāraya samāsatam ca dasseti pajahantaḥ ramati iti
